name: Cecilia McDaniel
text: So let's be honest and brash here. Yes I am a former employee, who left the company because the current manager is a tyrant!! Today one of my associates called Hanes and asked if they could make change, the store manager got a nasty attitude, so my associate hung up. The store manager from Hanes stormed over to my store raised all kinds of hell and then had the NERVE TO ASK IF I HAVE COVID!!!... Y'all need to get her under control!! She is the sole reason I left the company!! Who or what gives her the right or the authority to ask that about other peoples private medical statuses, if there even is one?

name: Julie Dickey
text:
4/22/19
This seems to be the largest CATOs I've been in related to the River Region area yet it has less than those other stores. Shoe dept is way to cramped. Too many shoes packed in too small area to even look at shoes. Purse selection is limited & pricey to me. I can get similar purse at another large store & even name brand cheaper. Also the 1 thing I went for which I love CATOs for carrying is matching bra & panty sets. They were slim pickings plus had larger quality of panties with no match bra... theirs always have a match unless sold out. Now the pros: 2 female employees that spoke & asked if I needed assistance & when I didn't they kindly went to do something else. This I like. I know I can get them if I need to. I like the Spread of sizes from 2 to 20w or higher maybe. Also carry their bra sets in all these sizes. Same with accessories in S-2x belts W shoes... However since they took out the girls clothing I can no longer no longer buy pants from them. Use to get L-XL in girls and fit perfect. They've started carrying "some" petites but not many especially in Jean's & casual pants. 2p are extremely hard to find in there. Since Fall 2017 whoever was the buyer ... Missed it! The clothing this period is cheap fabric, style is almost All big, unfitted tops that a small could fit someone who wears a large. The fabrics are old lady designs & styles. Big flowers, wide wide leg pants, double knit jackets & the prices are high. You use to could come in CATOs & leave with a complete head to toe outfit that was adorable & affordable. Even their mark down  clearance is too high. This store is neat, clean, well organized & good displays. I didn't see clothes on floor or placed in wrong place. They are in a great location... CATOs just needs to get a buyer who knows what folks the age store is adapted for like & would wear. There's many items even on clearance that I would not want it was free. Reminds me of clothes I once made in Homeconomics in jr high. But I do love to shop CATOs anywhere I see 1 I stop in... thanks for carrying the bra sets that are pretty much affordable. Wished you'd bring back the lingerie, cute/sexy , sweet short gowns, teddies, corsets, stockings...
Oh & I think that they still have LayAWay

text: On Monday, May 3, 2021 I went to Cato in Wetumpka, AL to shop for a dressy, casual dress for a wedding on Saturday. There were two women employees that were extremely helpful and patient with me. I didn't know hardly anything about the latest dress styles that are popular so I had some anxiety picking out a dress and shoes. The two employees gave me some helpful tips, answered questions, and they even picked out a couple of dresses for me to try on. I ended up buying a dress that one of the ladies picked out for me to try. I don't know their names but I wanted to leave a good review.

text: I was in the Wetumpka store today and picked out 2 pairs of pants and a shirt to try on. I told the lady I had 3 items to try on so she unlocked the fitting room. When I came out she said she would return the clothes to the rack and said "you only had 2 pairs of pants?" I said yes, I had 2 pairs of pants and a shirt which is what I just gave you. She took them and then went to look in the fitting room that I had been in. I was the only customer that she checked behind while I was in there today which made me feel like she thought I was a thief.

text: HATEFUL workers. I do have a factory connection where I live. I was excited to find one. I did not notice the 4 items only sign in the dressing room. I had three dresses and my 10 yr old daughter wanted to try on two dresses. I locked the dressing room door and was completely undressed when the store clerk used her key to unlock it and slung the door open. I pulled it back closed and she asked through the door how many I had. I said I have three and my daughter has 2. She said well that's more than 4. I said I wasn't going to put my 10 yr old in a dressing room alone. We left after that. She did not have to be so rude!

name: Kieys j
text: Nice selection of boots

name: Matthew Montee
text: 8/5/21 3:45 p.m.  I was on my way home from Tennessee to Florida when I stopped in this location to replace a shirt that I had torn.  When I walked in I was greeted by the 2 associates ( young men) and quickly dismissed while they argued over who was a better photoshop expert.  As I browsed the limited inventory I found 3 different shirts that would suit my needs.  I was unable to locate the size I needed and asked for assistance.  One associate seemed put-off that I was interrupting his photoshop debate while the other kept talking.  The associate walked over to where I was and asked what size I needed.  He glanced at some bins, said, "We don't have it, go online, sorry." and quickly returned to his photoshop conversation.  I asked him to check the stock room and he again directed me to go online.  I understand help is hard to come by, during these times but it was quite clear this kid was just working for the clothing discounts and not the customer service.

name: Benjamin Cox
text: This was the absolute WORST experience I’ve ever had in retail... It was so SLOW that it took the staff 25 minutes just to ring up my three items. Also one of the staff would not stop asking me personal questions and judging me when I refused to answer the question. If I am paying the high prices that I pay for those clothes, then I should have a quick and friendly service. Instead I received an incompetent cashier and an overbearing staff.

name: Alexandria Hatfield
text:
Both summer AND winter clothing. I dropped off 5-6 bins full of men’s khaki shorts, khaki pants, jeans, dress shirts, & athletic gear. ***ALL are brand names such as POLO Ralph Lauren, J.Crew, Patagonia, Vineyard Vines, Coastal Cotton, Southern Marsh, Nike/Adidas, & much more!

***Most items are NEW w/ TAGS or barely worn clothes! All items are in GREAT CONDITION.*** (size 29-32 in mens/boys pants. Men’s size Small & Medium in shirts. Some “boys XL 18-20” in dress shirts as well.)

This is my brother’s first year at West Point (go Army!). He isn’t allowed to come home very much these next 4 years, so we have cleaned out his entire closet & have taken ALL of his clothes to Fashion Exchange in Athens, AL!

These clothes will only be allowed to stay on the floor for just 3 months. Go check them out soon!

name: Robin Lewis
text: One of my favorite places to shop. And the decorating and displays are unbelievable and a very helpful staff. If you've never been, they have something for every women, girl, mom in your life and of course yourself. Fantastic customer service. Really enjoyed having my name written in a chalkboard sign outside my dressing room. Had the best time spending my gift certificate.

resp.text: Robin, that's so sweet! Five stars! Thank you!! We LOVE our customers!!!

name: Mary Portland
text: I'm only giving 1 star because they don't have petites. I love the clothes, just wish they had petites, as regular sized clothes AREN'T PROPORTIONED for petites, and contrary to what folks tell you when you visit to buy, SMALL AND EXTRA-SMALL ARE NOT THE SAME... wrong proportions. I do like the clothes, and would buy them if they were in my size.

resp.text: Hello Mary, I know you gave us this review a few months back and I thought we had responded to you! I am sorry it's so late. As for petites ... this is a tough one! Most manufacturers do not produce true petites any longer. In fact none of our manufacturers do. In understanding this we do our best to try to find tops with shorter torsos and pants with shorter lengths. I am sorry we were not able to offer those sizes! Please do come back and visit, we have fabulous jewelry and our staff would be happy to help find items that might work for you!

name: Susan Bennett Smith
text: Customer service far exceeded my expectations. Nice boutique and reasonable prices.

resp.text: Hello Susan, I just wanted to thank you for your earlier review! It means so much that you took the time to tell us about your experience! We so appreciate the five star rating! Your shopping with us allows us the opportunity to serve you! Thank you for being a Tulip customer!!

resp.text: Wow Mindy, thank you for the sweet comments and five star review! I am sorry I am just now seeing this, but I want to thank you for taking the time to review us! It really means a lot to a small family owned business like ours!! Thank you for shopping with us!!

text: I love this shop. Super convenient in Hoover. Excellent selection of clothing all new, up-to-date fashion. Beautiful accessories /jewelry,  high end shoes, sandals and boots. name: Erica Jackson
text: So me and my mom visited this boutique on yesterday, the products were beautiful but the customer service was horrible!! We both get our hair done at the salon few doors down , so we decided to go in and browse until our appointment time. My mom is in a wheelchair, so I opened the for us both and went in. Two young ladies who worked at the register not once acknowledged us. No hello , may we help you, not even a hand wave.. even if you thought we weren’t going to purchase anything, common curiosity should’ve kicked in!! They both set at the register and talked to each other and looked at they’re phones!! I work in a public environment also , you’re supposed to always greet your customers!!  Want be back !! Lost a customer!!!

name: Lori Sissa
text: They do not stand by their word.  I was told they would correct a mistake they made but they put me off and never did.  They volunteered to correct but then dropped the ball.   No one knows what they are doing.    Very rude and unhelpful.   Will not shop there again!

text: Close are super cute and recently price. Young girl working was very nice and helpful.

name: Emily Pace
text: So disappointed. The store is super cute, but the owner has awful customer service. She does not care one bit about her customers. I hate to not be able to support a small business. When I went to Instagram to let them know my concerns, instead of anyone reaching out, the Owner deleted my comment. I was beyond shocked.

text: Everything about this place is adorable.. the staff, clothes, decor, etc! So many options with great prices and amazing customer service!

name: Marissa Belcher
text: I am a shopaholic so when this boutique moved in right next to my work I about died! Everything in the store is absolutely stunning and I think almost all of it is for sale! They are constantly getting in new merchandise and cute unique pieces too not the same ole same ole from Soca or Fabrik! Now to mention the workers! Meaghan is absolutely amazing and funny! She is always helpful, never judges me, and never hesitated to take the time out of her busy schedule to help me pick out matching items! Katie is so sweet and kind and always makes you feel wanted in the store. She Always greets me when I walk in and is always bubbly and happy! Together these two girls make a ROCKSTAR team and I honestly believe that Market House Boutique would not be the same if they were not there. Thank you girls for making my experience there always a good one!

name: Susan Harris
text: The two female workers were very rude and unhelpful today. They sat in their computer looking at videos and talking about concerts the entire time. Poor customer service.

name: McKena Fox
text: The prices here are pretty reasonable. I got one of my all time favorite shirts here about three years ago and it looks amazing still. They always have cool stuff and sales. I wish I lived closer to it so I could go more often, but I order 90% of stuff online now because of distance. The style is great for women and for coats like puffy coats they always have cute ones in the winter time if that’s something you’re into. The sizes are a pretty large variety so you can get whatever size you need usually. Overall, I love it and hope this helps.

name: Ebony Wesley
text: My friend went into this store and she bought a shirt with a golden zipper. She realized 2 days later that the zipper has broken. The person who was ringing up her items was treating it roughly. 2 days later, she opened the bag and noticed this problem. She had a reciept, if I may add. So she called Rainbow, and politely explained the situation to them, and she still had a reciept. Rainbow told her that she could not return the item without no tag, they said "On the tag, there is a 7 day return policy". So my question is, why does a simple tag keep a customer from returning a item that is not in good use even though they have a reciept.

name: Emily Ivy
text: I visited the Ann Taylor Factory Outlet today at the Tanger Outlets. When entering the store we were not greeted by the sales associate. I found two pair of pants that I wanted to try on. When I walked to the dressing room the associate said come on back. When I asked her which one she rudely responded. There was no friendly customer service, yet when the lady came in behind me she was super friendly and personable. I was very dissatisfied with my experience. I worked retail myself and was always told that no matter what a person looks like they are a customer and should be treated with friendliness and attentiveness. Please let the employee know that just because a person isn’t dressed in an expensive outfit, that doesn’t make them any less of a customer.

When I asked her questions she barely acknowledge me and gave me cold and short responses. I finally left without making any purchases or continuing browsing. This was my first visit to this store and will definitely not be going back if that is how all customers are treated.

text:
Awful experience. The girls behind the counter were making fun of other coworkers and I was treated as if I was going to steal something. The girl was motioning when she thought I wasn’t looking and said, I’m keeping these boxes.

Then, when I got to the register, the shoes were more expensive than I thought. Because of that and what happened earlier, I walked out and left the shoes. I won’t be back.

I would have let two of the staff members go on the spot, if I were their manager. Be polite, professional and push the buttons on the register. That’s all. Otherwise, go home.

I’m currently headed to another store to buy the exact same pair of shoes. Thanks.

text:
My first experience in there was positive. I didn’t need any assistance and I got what i wanted and checked out quickly @ about  8:30pm
The next day however they were very rude. I got a pair of shorts for 19.99 on sale; my SIL decided she wanted a pair we asked them to check the price and they refused! like it was the biggest  Inconvenience to run the scanner over the barcode 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️ they insisted I must have bought a pair that said s18 as in last season. I checked my tag when I got home and sure enough they said s19 just like the rest of the shorts on the rack that looked identical  ... seriously though would it have killed them just to check instead of insisting that they couldn’t have possibly been on sale!!

resp.text: Chelsea, it was such a pleasure meeting you!! Thank you so much for the kind words and we are here for anything you need!!

text: I love shopping at Elitaire. The entire team is knowledgeable and can help you find the best items or looks for your specific style or event. Affordable and high quality, you can tell that Kayla hand picks every single item with her clientele in mind. This is also a great spot for affordable and thoughful jewelry that lasts & other great gifts. Wonderful local products from makers in Huntsville. Also, great atmosphere to shop in. Not pushy or overwhelming - comfortable and open environment to have fun and dress up! Cannot recommend enough. Walkable to coffee shop, downtown restaurants and more. Support this place!

resp.text: We can not thank you enough for this amazing review, Emily! Thank you so much for all the kind words!

name: Karen Shipman
text: Elitaire is every woman's boutique!  Here you will find clothing that is classy, timeless, beautiful and one of a kind to Huntsville!!! Kayla has always had impeccable style!! She brings classic and elegant clothing that can take you from the office  right to the wonderful events around town. It is truly a blessing to see her dream finally come true. Come shop with her soon!!! You will not be disappointed!!!

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Hands down my FAVORITE place to shop for clothes in Huntsville. The owner is the sweetest and is so helpful every single time I come here. She has on numerous occasions helped me pick out some of my favorite pieces in my closet. She has the best selection of clothes and shoes--truly unlike any other boutique as far as the quality and style. LOVE this place and would highly recommend this store to everyone! :)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your amazing review, Samantha!! Your kind words have made our day!!!

name: Keeping Up with the Hogans Franthony and Harper
text:
Absolutely gorgeous boutique, effortless, welcoming customer service, very knowledgeable about the product.
Kayla was beyond sweet and professional, while also being genuine and fun!
Prices are perfect for the area's demographics and very fair.
Thank God there wasn't a blouse for $300!! ;)

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!! We SO enjoyed meeting you!!

name: Anna Gaddis
text: The owner was very helpful and sweet! The shop is organized and not cluttered looking. Happy with my boots, though they were just a tad too snug. I recommend coming here!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the sweet review! We are so glad you loved our store!

name: Jessecca Miller
text: My favorite place to shop for everyday items and also when you need something extra special! I've taken my friends and family here and Kayla is always such a sweet spirit and so helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the amazing and kind review! I appreciate you so much and look forward to seeing you again soon!

text: In my opinion, this is the best boutique in Huntsville. The clothing is very high quality, and I always have a great experience chatting with the staff and finding something I feel great in.

resp.text: Alison! We are so thankful for this amazing and generous review! It means the world to us that you not only love our products but also our staff. Providing exceptional customer service is our number one goal. Thank you again and we will see you soon!

text: The store is nice and everything is stocked nicely and very neat. The styles are decent but unfortunately they do not carry XS. The clothing isn’t made for short, petite folks like myself. :(

name: Baylee Fuqua
text: I normally always pick dress up to shop in its close to my house and it’s somewhere me and my daughter both love. We have always had a wonderful experience but today not so much. Today my daughter and her friend decided we’d do some shopping and eating while they had their “big girl” lunch together I walked two stores down to dress up and decided I’d look for her a cute dress while they had their time together to chat! Found the cutest two dresses and proceeded to the check to ask if I could leave them there for ten mins while I walk literally two stores down. I’ve done this time and time before we always eat at the local restaurant connected to the strip mall. I was quickly told NO sorry we can’t hold anything. I was a little shocked and explained she was two doors down and I wanted to make sure they were a good fit due to them being final sale. The two looked at each other and said sorry because you can go online 24 hours and order we aren’t allowed to hold anything. Now if I’d previously not held something before maybe I’d believe them. One proceeded to say I’ll put it in the fitting room and we can just say she’s waiting on the fitting room!! Which means YOUR HOLDING IT. I smiled and told them that was ok and walked out needless to say I will only order from online or if I see the manager ( can’t remeber her name but she’s awesome) I’ll only shop then. These two youngsters possible need a lesson on customer service!!!

Prices are very affordable too for a more boutique style business. It is also where I get a lot of my crop tops, which can be hard to find in other stores here.

name: Danielle Morgan
text: I LOVE Madewell. The store is always very well organized and the staff are super helpful - especially when trying on things and them knowing how they should fit. Great quality clothes. Recommend to everyone I know!

name: Brandi Russell
text:
I cannot say enough good things about Madewell.  It is my go to store for cool, effortless and flirty clothing.  Although it is known as the "twenty-something year old" version of J. Crew, both my mother and grandmother are always able to find fabulous pieces, and I will surely rock my items from here for years to come.

Most significantly, their jeans are made extremely well (hence, the befitting name) and come in a variety of both traditional and semi-trendy styles (i.e., ripped denim and fringed hems, but nothing overboard). I am a curvy 5'9 and I love that I am able to buy jeans straight from the store here.  I also love that they offer a plethora of stylish tops from reasonably priced basics to high end silk blouses.  I'm also very fond of their boot selection. I currently own 4 pair that still look brand new and feel amazing and I look forward to adding more to my wardrobe.  Lastly, Heather, the manager at this location, is amazing!!  She is very down to earth, personable and well versed in all things Madewell.

name: mae wetzel
text: Holy what!!! I've never been treated this poorly in a retail store in my whole life! Especially considering I had spent over 250$ there over the course of one week. Older blonde woman with god awful attitude treated me like a poor peddler when I asked to try on shoes, I even purchased some clothing and she was a witch while checking me out. Lady- you need to find your calling because it is NOT the service industry. I cannot believe Madewell would continue to employ someone like this- next time I shop madewell I'll just drive 2 hours to Atlanta because no one deserves to be treated that way.

Keep up the great work Divas!!!

name: Michelle Bracey
text: I have ordered from this site numerous times and have always had a positive experience. The clothes are very reasonably priced and quality is good for the price. I've seen several reviews say the clothes "all come from China" like that's unusual. Most everything we wear does! The sizing seems to be correct, they're are alot of tunics and loose fitting clothes, so sizing is forgiving I think. Shipping is usually 5 days, and I'm good with that. Give Discount Divas a try, you WON'T be disappointed!

name: Ashley Vibert
text: Love Love the clothing purchases and quality on most of the items.  The selection and promotions are fantastic.  My only complaint is if there is a coupon code used that you can't return the merchandise even for a return fee.

text: I've purchased several items and they were true to size,  good quality, and I get loads of compliments when I wear them.  Quick shipping and they answer questions quickly too.

text: I think the clothes are really cute... However sizing is off a bit. I measured myself....Some tops fit in the bust ( which are the measurements given) but they are too tight in the arms. And then some things are way big....Returning cost almost $7 to ship...When I could easily drive. Now one of the shirts that does fit...Has a hole....Worn 5-6 times... Delicate wash and hang dried. Disappointing.

name: Lauren Niosi (Lniosi)
text: Always receive products super fast and haven't had an issue with poor quality for the items I've ordered. Super affordable and super cute!

name: Ashley K Oak
text: The quality of these clothes is just not good. The reviews on their Facebook are questionable considering people claim these clothes are made in the US and are of high quality, they are not everything I’ve received is made in China. I’ve ordered a lot of items because these clothes are unique and exactly my style and the ordering and shipping is fast and simple. But all those things mean nothing when the quality is a joke. Every item I’ve bought is hand wash only and even with hand washing they only last a couple wears for me. I’ve left previous comments that I wish they would specify if something is hand wash only and they said they can’t because they don’t always know. They can do fit videos but can’t tell you if it is hw only. The prices are higher than most retailers I shop at so “discount” is misleading. Overall the clothes are not worth the price

name: M Nich
text: Cute clothes, amazing prices.

name: Renata K. Libhart

name: Blair Gilliland
text: POOR customer service!! Lady will not go out of her way to help out someone who lives 30 min away and doesnt want to have to drive back one day later to pick up the part of her order that is "not ready for pickup" when she is here today to pick up the other part of her order that was ready.

name: ramona williams
text: This is my favorite place to shop, the quality of the clothes is amazing and the customer service is even more amazing. Any time I've had an issue I've emailed them and they've responded promptly and they've always been more than willing to help and make any necessary corrections that I've needed. Once I was sent a sweater that had a defect, a hole, and I sent a picture, and they said just donate it and gave me a credit, once I needed to cancel an order and they promptly did that and gave me a credit. I can't say enough good things about the clothes and these ladies, they truly strive to satisfy their customers, that's why I keep coming back, and back, and back again...

resp.text: Sarah Caroline, we LOVE hearing great things about our sweet staff! I am so glad they were able to help you put outfits together! Shopping should be fun and not a chore! Thank you for your review!

text: Friendly & great service! I went in this shop for the first time yesterday. They put my items in a dressing room. Asked my name. Checked on me several times during try on. Even called another location to find a size I needed.

resp.text: Awesome Susan! That is just the type of customer service we were built on! We have a wonderful group of young ladies that carryout  our customer service mission! Girls with sweet hearts and helpful spirits! We thank you so much for the five star review and hope you will visit us again!

text: My friends suggested The Pink Tulip when I said I needed new clothes. This location is closest to my work so I decided to stop in one day. I had no idea of what to even pick out or put together because I am more of a casual dresser. Wow! I was thoroughly impressed with Ms. Kristin!! She really listened to me when I explained what I like & then helped me pick out a couple outfits that I could wear out or even to work but still feel comfortable. My first experience to The Pink Tulip at this location was just perfect! I already had to go back for more. I highly recommend Ms. Kristin at this location!!! She will make you feel like it is all about you  & help you pick out what is right for you! I will be back to this location for sure.

resp.text: Wow Lori, What a blessing it is to read your very kind review! This is the type of customer service I founded the company on! It warms my heart to hear of our sweet girls having the same heart! Thank you for taking the time to give us such a wonderful review!! I will make sure Kristin knows what kind words you had to say! Thank you again! And thank you for shopping with us!! Letty

text: This little Boutique has some of the cutest clothes, but at least when I was there, they didn't have much of a "plus size" selection. The staff was really friendly and helpful in trying to find styles that I prefer for the occasion I needed.

resp.text: Katie thank you for rating us! We will have spring rolling in soon. Come back to see us!!!

text: Gorgeous clothing selection and great overall ambiance. Impressed by their jewelry selection too.. (much more inside than I had expected). Expect boutique pricing.. trade off: amazing clothing and accessories~

resp.text: Tiffany, thank you for your five star review! We believe you will LOVE our upcoming selection and pricing! We are bringing in fabulous selections in the thirties and low forty’s! We always strive to offer those special items that are select to our business! Many of our jewelry items are hand made as well! Again thank you for taking the time to give us a review!!

text: This is a must visit location.  Clothing and accessories for all ages. Every store had its own decorating style.  Very creative yet classy. Fabulous sales people. And they even write your name on your dressing room. They have a Facebook page also. And they ship.

resp.text: Robin, thank you for your fabulous review! Yes we do ship and we also have added a sister online site, hadleykatherineclothing.com. This site offers fabulous fashions at very affordable prices!!  We invite you to check it out!

name: Ally Cantrell
text: Disappointed with the customer service at this boutique. All of the other bad reviews are right on. I made a purchase along with a pair of earrings and I wanted the earrings more than the shorts. When I received the package the earrings were not in the bag. Upon calling the store to see if it was an accident that they didn’t get put in with the package the little girl said, “well they must have fallen out bc it ‘says’ they were put in there. I’ll talk to the girl that packaged the order and have her call you on Monday.” 3 days later no call or follow up. Just goes to show they don’t care about their customers by all of the negative reviews.

name: Ansley Nielsen
text: This is my favorite boutique, and the costumer service is excellent! The clothing is the best and very good quality! It’s my go to place when I need an outfit.

name: Nicole Reid
text: I wanted to go in to just look around well the customer service was HORRIBLE and they were starring me up and down I just got done cleaning so I didn’t have any top notch clothes on to go look well I still go in they look at me the whole time like I was gonna steal something and I’d never do that and I heard a customer in the dressing room saying the pants were to much and the worker said yea well they are worth every penny with a attitude and she ended up not buying nothing either. they were over priced and very cluttered I didn’t buy anything and don’t plan on going back.

resp.text: Hey Nicole! I'm so sorry that you had such a bad experience. We try to give our customers a more personalized shopping experience and train our employees to be active and engage with customers so that we can offer our help if needed! We know there is a lot of inventory in the store and it can get overwhelming so we try to be as diligent as we can to meet our customers needs and be able to help them find everything they are looking for. It never has anything to do with thinking you are doing something wrong! If you have any questions or concerns please give us a call.

name: Skyler Brown
text: If I could give them negative stars I would!! Pricing is way over the top (not that I can’t afford) for the quality everything is. I came in to shop for a photoshoot, as I was trying items on, I was told I was too small to shop here and i needed to go to a child’s clothing store! Hated the attitudes I was given and felt so claustrophobic in there! Will not return after my experience!

name: Amanda George
text: Best selection of Z-supply and other boutique brands.

name: Ryan VanSickle
text:
If you like spending $100 on jeans only to wear them twice before they rip then have the store refuse to do anything for you, this is the place for you.

At that particular price point, one would expect better quality products, along with better customer service. Sadly, neither were delivered. I asked who I believe to be the manager if she would be ok with spending $100 on jeans and only wear them twice then throw them away. She said, "not necessarily." So I asked, "but you are ok with me and your other customers doing that?" After that she simply answered a disingenuous "I'm sorry" over and over until I left, with no solutions or answers. Her pretentious and discourteous attitude spoke volumes about the customer service, or lack there of, at the store.

I certainly won't be back, but I encourage others to read the reviews prior to visiting (spoiler alert: mine isn't the only one like this). In today's retail atmosphere of "shop small", I would expect and appreciate genuine customer service.

text: I want to start by saying the only reason I give it 4 stars is because the staff wasn’t welcoming at the time, love the clothes but it made me want to shop else where because of how the staff was. When I went to try on stuff, which I was iffy about (covid-19), but I have to try on certain stuff. At first i was the only one in the store for a little while before a second person came in, I asked about the dressing room, girl went in to clean it sanitize which I appreciate. But if I’m about to buy something & I’m trying it on why is the staff asking how long I got in the dressing room she knocked on door more than once , like was there a time limit or something? she kept asking me other people need to try on stuff I’m thinking like it’s about 4 other rooms & then they told me once I go in I can’t go in but once.  With that being said I made sure that I took in all what I could & wanted to purchase. Like don’t rush I’m trying multiple pieces, come out it’s like one person with two other people sitting including a man, which he is not trying on stuff waiting. Manager kept making small comments to staff hardly spoke when I came in....I wanted to give them a piece of my mind but wasn’t worth my time,  hence store was only open about 45 mins when I arrived so I don’t want to hear anything about a long day. Would have never went into store but shop online but I needed something I didn’t want to wait To ship only to arrive with limited selection. The world is already in a crisis to have people like this   Someone would love to have your job & customers are what keeping it open.

name: Kira Lunar (Kira131)
text:
I was an employee at this very Dressbarn store, years ago, and I went in, somewhere between 5pm and 6pm on June 7th to look around and see if we (my friend and I) could find something. Now normally, most employees were all required to greet and help the customers. We were in the store for fifteen minutes and no one asked us if we needed any help, or anything.

It would have been better, if they ignored us.

Instead, the four Black women stared at us from the cashier counter and would start laughing at us.

This happened three to five times, while we were there.

We kept to ourselves, but that was the first time that my friend and I felt unwelcome in Dressbarn.

I love Dressbarn's clothing and professional atmosphere usually, but maybe I should start online shopping, if this is the new normal.

My friend and I will not be coming back, any time soon.

name: Julie Stewart
text: If I could give one star, I definitely would. My daughter has never been "prom dress shopping", so this was a special event for her. We drove 2+ hours to Elan, and we were greeted as we entered the store. Everything else from that point was terrible. My daughter tried on several gowns and the salesgirl held the train on each dress as I took a photo of my daughter in it - never one time did she ever ask us not to take photos of the gowns. After my daughter had tried on about 4-5 dresses, one of the other salesgirls commented "we don't really like for y'all to take photos of the tags", to which I said I was sorry and we stopped taking photos of the tags on the gowns. I was unsure why, but I assume it is because their gowns are marked up well over retail. After my daughter tried on 1-2 more gowns, an older lady walked over to us and very rudely yelled at my daughter if she was taking pictures she would have to delete all of them before leaving the store. She also said "I know two of my girls have already told you to stop taking pictures". This is untrue, as the only person who had previously said anything was the salesgirl (not ours) that said not to take photos of the tags. I could see my daughter was very visibly upset, so we said thank you and left the store. They lost my business forever, as well as everyone I know that I can tell about our experience. My daughter commented when we left that she never wants to go prom dress shopping ever again, so I am really upset that these incredibly rude girls have ruined this experience for my daughter.

resp.text: This customer was not treated anything but wonderful in our store. She was greeted upon arrival and employees spent hours catering to her every need.  If mistreated the entire time no one would spend 2 hours in a store. Upon entry into our store on the front door and posted at every dressing room are NO photography signs. That is our store policy due to customers like this one.  Once a gown is purchased you are more than welcome to take all the photos you would like. This specific customers after being asked twice not to take photos continued to take pictures of Gown tags and photos of gowns. If you plan to purchase a gown in our store there would be no need to take photos of our tags. All of our gowns are priced the same as any other retailer so you will not find it cheaper unless it is a used product. After being asked repeatedly to not take photos and the customer blatantly in front of employees & other customers continuing to not follow store policy she was asked very politely by the store manager to please delete any photos taken in our store as it is against store policy. No one ever raised their voice at this customer nor were they mistreated in any way.  They were kindly asked to follow the store policy like every other customer. This customer then left our store after taking up hours of employees’ time, trying on our product, finding her correct size and went on resale sites posting exactly what size she needed and photos of herself in our merchandise in our store trying to find it at a used price. We are a small business trying to succeed after a struggle with Covid and customers like this one are the reason we have store policies in place to try to combat people taking advantage of hard working individuals and businesses.

name: Aminah Masood
text:
Never go to this store.
I applied for a credit card with my first purchase and got approved. When I returned my items I kept a shirt. Paid for the shirt with a check. The following month I received the statement. It showed I owed 82.19. No one will listen that I returned those items. Apparently they stand firm on saying you owe them instead of investigating. THEY DO NOT CARE. ONE BIT. IF THEY SAY YOU OWE IT YOU OWE IT OR THEY DESTROY YOUR NICE CREDIT SCORE. The employees either took the items themselves or made a mistake when refunding them. Either way, New York & Company does not care.

text: 2day was not a good experience...I have been shopping with this company since it was Lerner's and never have I ever😕 only reason I'm giving 2stars is because one clerk greeted ma as I walked in as well as when I left...and note I was only making a return with receipts and before return policy dates!

name: Marquittia Bradford
text: There is a cashier there... her name may be Shelby.  I forgot to ask when I was checking out because she'd left for the day heading to the UAB library (I overheard her talking).  I called this morning to get her name but April (who said she was a manager) told me that she couldn't give me her name. The young lady this review is about is  African American and wears her hair in a natural afro type style. This young lady is a determent to your establishment.  Upon me arriving, I walked to the rear to inquire about a restroom.  In a very annoyed tone, she says "Ma'am is there something I can help you with back there?"  I walked from the dressing room and said "I was looking for a bathroom." I've visited the NYCO at the Summit and familiar with the bathroom being located near the dressing room.  Very snippy, she said "our bathroom is not open to the public try The Children's Place".  I said thank you and she begin to talk very sternly to another customer about a coupon that she could NOT accept.  So I left to head to the Children's place, and returned to hear this lady now talking to another customer about the mis-placement of a blouse/shirt.  I was eavesdropping, but I didn't have to try hard because the cashier has a loud, stern, firm voice and it echoed thru the building.  She pretty much was telling the patron that she would not give her a shirt for a price just because it was located in an area that had a sign for a less expensive cost. The message she conveyed may have been true, but again, her TONE and ATTITUDE were horrible.  The customer left quielty.  But that was not the end of the convo for your cashier.  Two other cashiers were talking in whispered voices with the young lady and they seemed to be trying to calm her down.  In her overly loud voice the cashier (again I think her name is Shelby but I do not recall), this young lady repeatedly yelled "she doesnt know who I AM!  I could be the regional manager!  I could have really shown her who I was, but I'm trying to be professional.  She and her mother...and she is this, and she is that...."  I was shopping in your store and there were at least 4 other customers inside the store at the time.  So her tone definitely disturbed our shopping experience. I just needed this to be known because it appears that this young lady thinks that her behavior is appropriate.   I was happy to see her go because I did not want her to check me out at the cash register. I hope the lady she was rude to reports her as well. It was inappropriate and lacked professionalism.

text: This was a 50th Wedding Anniversary with a bridal party from 5 different states with 5 different sizes, shoes and accessories. This is the place to handle anything. Any issue was rectified immediately by the Tuscaloosa management, especially Shanty. An example, the shoe size was not right, they had it shipped to the women's front door. But more importantly, their calm attitude and work ethic  was of great value. Kept the bride and girls at peace as details were worked out quickly. Everything worked out lovely and everyone looked great! Thank you Shanty and staff. We had a wonderful time working with you.

text: Loved it!!!!!  The experience was amazing and the assistant helping me was all smiles I was very part leased and even found my dress

name: Amber Barger
text: I went to David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa on Saturday. I didn't have an appointment. The girls got me right back. Shelby was my stylist & she was awesome. I told her exactly what I wanted; which was a dress with sleeves.  I showed her pictures from online & she found all the dresses. I'm a plus size bride so I was scared; I wouldn't have a lot of selections. I was very wrong; they had dresses in stock for any size bride. Shelby found me three great dresses. There was a dress online that had short sleeves. Shelby let me try on the same dress in strapless & told me she could order it for me with sleeves. Shelby explained payment arrangements & credit options to pay for the dress. Shelby broke everything down in detail for me. Which was very helpful for a new bride with a budget. I was very close to ordering that dress. But, I really wanted to try it on with the sleeves. I was so impressed with David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa; I made an appointment the same day at the David's Bridal in Hoover. I was thinking Hoover would have more dresses with sleeves & possibly have that dress with sleeves to try on. That was the worst idea ever. The store in Hoover is a huge disappointment for David's Bridal. The customer service needs to be reviewed at the Hoover store. The employees at that store are very unprofessional. After the bad experience at the Hoover store; I started reading reviews & asking friends. Apparently that is common for the David's Bridal in Hoover. If I decide to order through David's Bridal, it will definitely be with the Tuscaloosa David's Bridal. Great job David's Bridal in Tuscaloosa.

Jill K.

name: Kylie Jerkins
text: The customer service at Francesca's is above and beyond. After walking around all afternoon looking for a dress that was appropriate for a basic training graduation, I was so close to just giving up. I ended up at Francesca's as a last ditch effort, thinking that they didn't carry anything of that caliber, and the two store associates there threw together at least 10 different full outfits for me to try on. I ended up falling in love with one of the outfits, so they also helped me pick some accessories. They were so helpful, attentive, and caring. I'll definitely return.

And yes, that is her job, but I've worked in retail management for a few years now and that was above and beyond! First time shopper turned lifelong shopper. That's what you look for in retail. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

text: I had a great time shopping yesterday! Katy helped me shop around for the perfect Valentine’s Day outfit, and told me about the great deals! She added these heals that were absolutely p-e-r-f-e-c-t!!! When I come again I hope she’s there to help!

name: Grace kalana
text: Staff gets all in your face, asks too many questions and is just overall creepy. I AVOID this store at all costs after I had a bad experience before this one. I figured maybe it’d be better, but no this place was much worse. I left the store because of how uncomfortable I was. Not a good experience at all, definitely wont be going back.

name: Amy Mills
text: I loved the customer service and the prices were reasonable. Our salesperson spent a lot of time helping us out with dresses and was very helpful.

name: Holland N
text: A nice boutique but customer service brings the experience down :( About a year ago I had a romper I was trying on and wanted to buy, then the sales employee discouraged me from buying it. Even though I told her I liked it, she tried to convince me that I didn't, and called it inappropriate. I was used to the employees here being pushy but left that day feeling very surprised and confused. Be careful because even my friend agrees they don't treat all people equally here. I haven't been back since.

name: Pratik J
text:
Decently big francesca's. Very similar to most of their sister stores. Been here during Black friday and they did have some decent sale items.

Overall, good store for buying home decor stuff

name: Tylan
text: Very nice clothing and the staff is very helpful. Also if you’re an impulse buyer like myself, they have millions of random goodies to catch your eyes and you never know when you will find a treasure you have to have

name: Ashley Patterson
text: Went to francescas 10 minutes before they closed and knew exactly what I wanted. I was putting on the shoes making sure they fit when the lady who claimed to be the manager suggested I go to payless. I said by the time I walked over there they would be closed and she said “well we are closed too.” It was 8:50 and they close at 9. I bought my stuff and left and was out the door by 8:55. I’ve worked in restaurants that close at 10 and had people walk in at 9:55 and order food and keep us there until 11 or later and we only get paid 2 an hour. This “manager” should really work on her customer relations if she wants people to return.

name: Vanessa Brown
text: I love this boutique!

name: Robert Walz
text: This is very much a case of "you get what you pay for" .  The prices are fair for quality clothes and there is a nice selection.

name: Kevin Cosby
text: No disappointments here! Outstanding service with very fast shipping. I was able to find one of my favorite shoes (Born Nigel slip-on) here at a great price. I highly recommend Bennetts Clothing!

resp.text: Thanks for the high 5 and shopping with us. It’s always great to gain a new customer and friend.

name: Cory is A weiner
text: The store is very dirty, lots of bugs. Look in the corners and underneath furniture. Bugs galore! Very unsatisfied with everything I’ve bought. He jacks prices way higher than necessary and scams the older individuals that shop there. I would not recommend supporting this store. If I could give 0 stars I would.

resp.text: We are sorry that you were unsatisfied with our store and would love to correct  any issues in person instead of hiding behind a screen. We always try to offer customers the best service with the best price in a clean environment.

name: Mike Cameron
text: Absolutely the best

name: Dawn Green
text: The only place that had what we needed. And a nice selection of men's hats. I plan to visit again and buy one.

resp.text: It was a pleasure having you shop with us Dawn. Hope we see you again soon.

name: Deborah S Epperson
text: Very thankful to see a younger nicer staff. I came here 8years ago and the older ladies treated us bad. Today was the first time I had been back. I will come more often now that they have a better staff. Way to go girls. You get an A+. Thanks

name: Tara W
text: Went in looking for something in particular and Mr Bennett was very friendly and helpful. Got exactly what I needed and found more at a great price!

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Tara. Pleasure to be of assistance!!

text: I ordered boots online and they arrived so fast and are great! I will order from you guys again!

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with Bennetts clothing.com. We hope you will share our name with friends and wish you a happy holiday season.

name: Donnamarie Roderick
text: It was our first visit to the Boutique and wasn't sure what to expect.  We were instantly welcomed by Rachel who asked what brought us in.  She then directed & assisted us in locating suitable dresses for my son's wedding.  She gave positive & honest feedback and helped us find the perfect dress for the occasion.  Not only was Rachel professional but her keen eye and her warm touch & positive spirit made our shopping experience  wonderful.  We are already planning for our next shopping trip. Rachel is Awesome!!!

name: JORDAN ROBERTS
text: Rachel and the family that owns the shop are phenomenal! I highly recommend their merchandise and from very high quality folks! :) They are very honest Christian folks that serve all the community very well and offer some awesome stuff!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jordan!

name: Robin Bierworth
text: Fantastic place to shop! My friend and I were both looking for a dress for a wedding and had spent hours looking at several stores, her in North Carolina and me here in Huntsville. Neither of us could find any thing suitable. I found "Off the rack consignment" on line, best find!! They have a great selection, lots of sizes, good prices and are so helpful helping you pick out a selection to try on. Totally recommend the this shop.!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us, Robin!

name: Hannah Long
text: Best customer service I have ever received. The prices are perfectly reasonable for the higher quality and more fashionable clothes. The owner is the sweetest person! I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you, Hannah! We’re thrilled that you live Off The Rack!

name: Lillian R.
text: Found a cute summer dress and some cute shoes to match for less than $20. Great prices.  Definitely worth stopping by this shop.

resp.text: Thank you Lillian!

name: Tiana Minor
text: I found my dress for prom here.  The staff was nice and very helpful.

resp.text: We’re thrilled you found the perfect dress!

name: Armond Gafeney
text: Off the Rack is a first class consignment experience. The owner Rachel is great to do business with.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kayla Harman
text: I have purchased so many beautiful dresses from here for most of my high school dances. From personally seeing the store the past couple of years, I can safely say that there is something for everyone. If you leave without a dress or two I would be really surprised. Both Rachel's are amazing!

resp.text: Thanks Kayla!

name: Cindy Lehman
text: Surprisingly nice products of high quality at very modest prices. Not like other consignment shops in this area. They stock a range and selection from elegant to casual at affordable prices. The staff is most helpful and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We’re thrilled that you enjoyed your visit!

name: Kelly McDaniel
text: I have bought several formals from this boutique. Today they were a lifesaver with helping me find stylish, affordable, and up to date outfits for me to wear into the upcoming colder weather for work. They are extremely helpful, friendly & there to assist in anyway possible. I will continue to support this local business & look forward to shopping there again soon.

resp.text: Thank you Kelly! You are truly a valued customer of ours! We are so thankful for you! Have a great work trip!

name: Alicia Presley
text:
I needed a dress for an upcoming wedding and this place saved the day!
The selection was great with a mix of reasonably priced items and high end dresses, some still with tags attached.
The ladies were so amazing and helped me start to finish even with my pickiness 😁 I found the perfect one and highly recommend them!

resp.text: We are thrilled you found the perfect dress!

name: Amanda Faye
text: Gorgeous dresses at such reasonable prices! Homecoming, prom, and even some wedding! It's definitely my first stop for formal and semi-formal wear, and their casual clothes are so cute! I recommend it to all of my friends.

resp.text: Thank you, Amanda! We appreciate your business!

name: Allen Dobbs
text: Very helpful, and took time for us even as busy as they were, as if we were the only one's there! Awesome experience.  Will be back

resp.text: Thank you so much! We’re thrilled that you are pleased!

name: Susan Kay
text: Got the dresses I went there for. Great selection. I did end up feeling a bit rushed to finish up with the dressing room so someone else could use it..... Which I get, however.... I rushed up my decision, made the purchase and while still sitting in the parking lot the teenagers I had hurried up for were walking back out to their vehicles with no purchase made.......wouldn't stop me from shopping again!

resp.text: Susan, we are so sorry you felt rushed, that was not our intent. It does get crazy busy during prom season so we do our best to give everyone equal time in the dressing rooms. Thank you so much for your business and we appreciate your understanding. We’re always striving to improve so thank you for the feedback!

name: Lisa Potter
text: Don’t lie on the phone and say you don’t do consignment when it’s right on your website. Also, try not to sound so rude when answering the phone like it takes every ounce of you to be kind.

resp.text:
Lisa, we’re sorry you had a negative experience. We do consignment yes, but we don’t purchase items outright. Consignment means you still own the item (we don’t buy it from you) and then when it sells you get a percentage of the sale. So sorry for the confusion. We also apologize for coming across as rude, we were short handed today with people waiting to check out and our
human-ness must have come through, thank you for understanding and for your review. Have a great weekend!!

name: Nancy Godwin
text: Great value! Wonderful service! Nice stuff!

resp.text: Thank you, Nancy!

name: Meshay P
text: If your looking to get rid of some clothes that are gently used,  this is a place to take them to make some extra $$. I didn't like the fact you have to check to see if your items sold & the owner gets rude when you call to check too much, even though she set the system up that way🙄

resp.text: Hi Meshay P, we aim to deliver a great experience but as humans we sometimes miss the mark. We’ll strive to do better. Have a great day!

name: Grace Hammond
text: Great dresses at great prices! Very friendly, helpful staff.

resp.text: Thank you, Grace!!

name: Kecia Pierce
text: Great selection, great prices! Ladies were so nice and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you so much, we appreciate your  business!

name: Jon Dize
text: Best consignment boutique I have ever been to. My wife left with several items and I enjoyed the "guy area" seating and planned TV area so that my wife could shop without me at her side. We look forward to returning soon.

resp.text: Thanks Jon! We look forward to seeing you & your wife again soon!

name: Erin Tomlinson
text: I love shopping with Rachel! It’s like having a personal shopper dress me every time I go! Prices and selection of both formal wear and everyday clothes is amazing!

resp.text: Thanks Erin! We think you’re pretty amazing too!

name: Virginia Esslinger
text: Great location, great selection and really helpful staff!  We will shop there again

resp.text: Thank you so much!

text: Rachel is amazing. She helps you find exactly what you want. She is great with sizing and helping you find what works for your body type. Her clothes are in amazing condition and it is a beautiful little boutique.

resp.text: Thanks Team Thrive! We appreciate your business & thankful for our friendship!

name: Erin Tripp
text: i love this store and i love how personal the owner is! she is super attentive to each and every customer, and her/his needs! definitely pop into Off the Rack next time you are looking for very high quality yet very affordable clothing in the huntsville area.... oh - she sells online, too!

resp.text: Thank you Erin!!

name: Miranda Wallace
text: Rachel is the kindest and always helps me find the perfect dress for my events! The store is filled with beautiful peices of all sizes, shapes, and colors. The prices are great, as well as the in-house tailoring. Look here for your next dress! You wont regret it!

resp.text: Thank you Miranda!

name: Rhonda Sandlin
text: Love the selection - something for everyone, and specialized customer attention. I'm a consignment lover and this is my best experience in Huntsville so far. I've been missing my Birmingham and Auburn spots.  Great job!

resp.text: Thank you so much Rhonda! It was great meeting you!

name: Mikala Wesson
text: I had a wonderful experience great customer service and affordable prices. Love this place!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for choosing Off The Rack!!

name: crystal hogan
text: I needed a dress for a special occasion and Off The Rack had so many to choose from. The prices were so reasonable I so enjoy shopping here.

resp.text: Thanks Crystal! We appreciate your business!

text: This was the worst place I have been to go look for dresses, the lady who helped us was rude and was really bossy.

I wasn’t there today (I’m the Owner) but I can only assume our Homecoming dress rush was in large part to blame for the negative experience. It’s gets very busy this time of year. Please stop back by and let us reintroduce you to our amazing inventory! I hope to see you soon!

name: mary moore
text: I have know this store in Auburn dice it began.  I also have been to. Troy store many times.  Highest regards to this family,olerated,store.  First. I know that they,show. God's love in this business.  I have and will continue my respect to this family as they are kind,and thoughtful.  Unless you have shopped there you should not judge them as they 're wonderful..  They treat you like they have known you all if,you life.  Go visit and find out for yourselves.

text: Love the owners and shop girls!! They also have cute clothes at great prices!

text: I bought a sweater at another location that was damaged. The girls at Dress Up Auburn we’re so helpful with the entire process of returning the sweater and ordering me the same one from another store. They even had the replacement sweater shipped to my house for free and it arrived in two days! I highly recommend these helpful ladies for all your boutique needs!

text: My new favorite boutique. Everyone I go, I get a pleasant surprise and I end up purchasing something. Great staff, very sweet young ladies.

text: The selection is so limited. The staff are friendly. The store is pretty clean and organized. The prices are all over the place. One of very few clothing stores in town.

name: becca mahoney
text: Friendly and helpful salespeople. Great sale prices.

name: Amy Hughes
text: Prices aren't bad, customer service is great, but I'm not thrilled with their selections.

name: Jeanie Young
text: Very friendly, helpful and endearing people.

name: Donna Thomas
text: Clothes have gotten limited of choice of age to choose from.

name: Nicole Hicks
text: Love shopping

name: Tammy Odom
text: Jane Loves Shoes… that says it all! JLS has an eclectic collection of high end shoes, boots, purses and accessories. If you want to add a little sunshine to your day there’s so many cute choices that you may need to make a few trips. Spring, Summer, Winter and Fall are equally represented in this stylish boutique. Did I mention clothing? Well I have snagged a couple of cute linen dresses and shirts. It’s beach couture coupled with resort casual wear. Totally brings a new definition to cute and sassy. I will be back

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Charles Conti
text: Very friendly staff. Amazing assortment of women shoes. My wife walked out with two pair

resp.text: Thanks so much for your thoughts. We strive to offer the best products and experience.

name: Mary Ann Nichols
text: The tall blonde working on 6/25/2021 needs customer service classes. You don’t just point vaguely to a space where an item is (that she was actually wearing). FYI-In Euro shoe sizes just add 30. Size 6 is a Euro size 36. I googled it…she was very “unfriendly “.

name: James Barker
text: Just called and ordered new running shoes for hubbie and me - they did curbside pickup no problem. We were surprised when we opened the boxes and found our free socks! Thanks very much for the socks and friendly service - the shoes fit great.

resp.text: Super happy that you had a nice shopping experience. We try to make every shopping experience, a great experience. Thanks for the review and your time.

name: Jim Hutton
text: The manager/salesperson was excellent as were the selections

resp.text: Hello Jim, it was our pleasure and we hope you add us as your goto place for great shoes and apparel.Thank you for your great review!

name: Emma Megan
text: My doctor wrote a "prescription" for me and told me to go to this store to help rectify my encapsulitis (inflammation of a metatarsal). MJ helped me through a thorough and helpful assessment and fitted me with shoes that immediately helped with the pain. Very happy with my new Hokas and inserts!

resp.text: Hi Emma, We are so happy to have been of service. We loved assisting you and we hope you feel better real soon. Thank you for the review.

name: Whitney Wilson
text: Wonderful selection and kind staff

resp.text: We appreciate your thoughts and wonderful review Thank you.

name: Tim Hubbard
text: Nice upscale fashionable store friendly staff.

resp.text: Hello Tim, we appreciate the great review and your time. Thank you

name: Anne Cobb
text: Love the clothes @ Town & Country. Definitely current but not trendy.  Great staple items & fun sales women. They’ll steer you to the perfect item or whole outfit!

name: Jennifer van Arcken
text: Nice little store with cute clothes. Katherine was extremely helpful and pleasant. I will return.

name: Erin Belk
text: This is a great place to shop for women of all ages. They offer lots of unique and trendy pieces as well as basics that you can’t live without. There are also a lot of beautiful handmade jewelry pieces and other accessories that I loved. The owner was working when I visited and she was super friendly and helpful.

name: ConnieSue77
text: Love this store!

name: Tiffany McNally
text:
The second I walked in the door, the ladies were awesome and willing to help.
Diane is amazing and started pulling my size off the shelf, gave me information regarding their credit applications, and helped me with everything I needed!!

name: Leilani Jordan
text: Found what I was looking for quickly.

name: Kimberly F
text: Cute clothes and the prices aren't outrageously high!

name: Bea Kniseley
text: Nice comfortable clothing, good deals.

name: Sherry McKenzie
text: I want to thank you guys for fast and friendly service from the front desk to Andrew to the nurse practitioner Mrs Abby. Even my nurse that gave me the shot thank you

name: Amy Wyatt
text: My favorite clothing store

name: AEH
text: This store has amazing, friendly, and wonderful employees! The clothes are always adorable, and you'll always find something you like! Highly recommend this store

name: Christine Cole
text: Great designer brands, great service (they helped me put an outfit together for my sister-in-law and mother-in-law this past Christmas), great sales and discounts on the hottest brands! And It's a fun place to shop: you'll feel like you're hanging out with your besties even if you're new to Leah's. They also carry amazing, drool-worthy cowboy boots, tennis shoes, sandals, and pumps and seriously enviable accessories; I won't even get started on all the Chanel and Louis Vuitton jewelry. You have to see for yourself!

name: Dr. Karen Bowen Dahle
text: Wonderful variety of clothes that are not seen in bulk from a department store. Classic and trends available. Staff are incredibly kind and knowledgeable. My favorite place to shop!

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent clothing and owners are very helpful

name: Mary Coe
text: This store was the absolute BEST addition to Huntsville! What a beautiful and welcoming place. The staff was so helpful & friendly! They went the extra mile to make sure I found exactly what I was looking for. Can’t wait to go back!!

name: Elizabeth McKinney
text: Went in last Tuesday to find a dress for my family photos. I ended up finding one and purchasing along with a couple other items but I felt uncomfortable the whole time. One of the employees was giving me a nasty look as if I couldn't afford anything in there. She would adjusted every piece of clothing after I looked at it and didn't make eye contact with me as I checked out. Cute store, but I won't be going back because of how they made me feel.

name: Sunny Lloyd
text:
So lovely!

Long story:
I lost my fashionista/best shopping buddy mom at the start of covid and spent most of the last year incredibly lost.
I basically gave up on looking or feeling pretty, I wore exclusively sweat pants, it felt too strange to try without my mom’s input.
When I walked into Monkee’s and saw all of these carefully chosen, beautiful pieces, I felt at ease.

I bought two gorgeous dresses, one in the most wonderful green—my mom’s favorite color. I was lead here in a way, my mom would have adored this boutique. And Kathryn was so kind and helpful, I’ll never shop anywhere else in Huntsville again!

resp.text: Thank you, Sunny! We loved having you in!

name: AL
text:
I used to be in love with this store when it was in the old shopping center, but lately it’s just went downhill. It’s mainly just Free People (which I get is expensive) and some other clothes that I could find at other boutiques for half of what they charge. They overprice all of the same items you can find other clothing stores or online (with free shipping). I didn’t have to search around much to find the exact same product for half the price. Also, the website never matches with what they have in stock currently. There was a $8 shipping fee, but on the website it said 20% with $5 shipping. The girls that work the register never seem
inviting when I walk in, they kind of stare you down in disgust. I wish it was what it used to be... Something needs to happen.

name: Julissa Floyd
text: The Manager at this place needs to be replaced and taught how she should treat customers (people in general)! I interviewed September 2018 for the store on the Blvd where she was assistant manager and She informed me of what I needed to do to pass the Orion test and asked me not to mention it to anyone that she told me how to pass. Took the test home and took it back to the manager at that location at the time that I knew very well by the way.. I waited for a call concerning my start date only to be informed that based off my scoring they were not able to proceed and I then advised the store manager at that time that We’ll you’re assistant provided me with info on how to pass so that is impossible for my scoring to be bad unless she intentionally gave me the wrong information so that I didn’t get hired.  A year And a few months later I apply again on Indeed For the Atlanta Hwy location Tara called me the exact same day for an interview I show up for my interview scheduled for 5:30 only to be turned around by Tara ... per her when Leslie (her boss) says no one time she will always say no! I have the screenshots from over a year ago that supports my story!!  Very Unprofessional,  this is Discrimination and so many more violations here and I can’t wait to proceed forward with my attorney avoid this place until they can find better leadership. I’m a faithful shopper at this location but not anymore nobody deserves to be treated this way and I will make sure it doesn’t happen again.

name: Margaret Sterling
text: Good clothes at a semi reasonable price for boutique items. But lets talk about the elephant in the room. These girls you have working here are not helpful in anyway. Im guessing they are teens that you thought would be great for your business networking, but in reality they are destroying your atmosphere. I was forced to listen to a 20 min conversation about snapchat and some inappropriate teenage drama as I was in the dressing room and the 2 girls were chatting like no one else was around. Please realize that you are alienating most people with these antics.

resp.text: Margaret... So very sorry for your bad experience at shoe fly madison. I immediately sent the girls the review.  We do have older people working there myself included. My name is Amy Word and I am in the owner. I would love to help you in any way. We do have a recent college grad that is 23 years old that is also very helpful. Moving forward we are only hiring  college grads and mature women like myself. I pray you will give us another opportunity to prove ourselves. Please ask for me the next time you are in and I would love to give you a $50 shoe fly gift card and my sincerest apologies. We are locally owned and I appreciate your input more than you know. Thanks again and have a blessed day!

text: Great shop with lots of options for babies, toddlers, kids, and even moms!!! I just recently discovered this store, and went in today for a teether... I was very pleased with all the options, and after narrowing it down, I still ended up getting two! There were a lot of brands I love and have shopped online, but now I have them right in my backyard!!! I'll definitely be back for all my future baby needs, as well as baby shower & birthday gifts!!! Shop Local!!!!

text: It can be hard to find tween girl sizes, but Marlee Jane's has a nice selection. I always bring my kids here to pick out presents for birthday parties and Christmas gifts. The toys are so unique, and the kids love that. A lot of them are educational or retro, and I love that.

text: Found a lot of really good sales when I went. My niece was spending her birthday money. Some really nice items and outfits to choose from. She bought a really cute outfit. She's a size 2. Her mom bought her some shoes from there that she liked as well.  The cashier was pleasant.

name: Ultreya Park
text:
Great deals again today, $5 espadrilles and a red rain jacket. So busy, no time for them to keep up w/picking up. LOTS of variety here. Friendly staff.

Few months ago, extra 50% off clearance and a lot to choose from. Picked up a jean jacket @ $9.50, sunglasses @ $5.53, gorgeous-blue cabbie hat @ $3.50, black wrap-type sweater-shrug, a crop sweatshirt, both @ $4.50, and for $2.50 each, a bright pink crossbody bag in shiny dark pink, and black flat dressy shoes that were not marked clearance, expected to pay $17.90! The manager was super-friendly, made sure we knew about the sale, offered help. The store was cleaner and more organized than sometimes. Ran out of time or I am sure I would have found more.

name: Reema Eqab
text: !!Completely disorganized and terrible service!! The customer service at this location was the worst I've see in a long time. Most of the employees were on their phones. When I went to the dressing room, the girl, without looking up from her phone, said "go ahead"  I was hesitant because she didn't ask to count my clothes. When I left the dressing room, I asked her where she wanted me to put my clothes, and she didn't answer. Then I said "do you want them here?" and she says, "put them over there." And as soon as I left, I heard her do a long attitude exhale. There was no organization in the clothes either, the shirts and pants were literally mixed around everywhere on all the racks. The jewelry section wasn't any better, the necklaces were all tangled together. We don't have a forever 21 in my location, so I decided to come here, but I don't think I'll waste my time next time. I'll just go to the Destin location.

name: Haleigh Lynch
text: I used to love this location but just recently walked out empty handed because the line was from the register and about 20 customers long which I would have been happy to wait in because I understood on Fridays at around 5 pm is a busy time what I did not understand was the multiple employees on two registers playing and about 5 employees near the exit that went to the parking lot walking in and out playing with the security sensors on their name badges. I understand not everyone is comfortable with working on a register and understand when there's down time to have fun but when a line is almost to the mall entrance? No thanks, I will take my business to Rue 21 and go to Panama City Beach  in Florida and shop at that Forever 21 location to get better customer service!

name: Snapple K
text: Love their options & prices. Friendly staff, most of the time. Too much crowded clothing racks. No organization at all.

text: This store definitely has the worst customer service in the mall hands-down. I went to the dressing room today and the two girls were on their phone both times I went. I tried to hand her t-shirt and she didn’t notice at first and when she did, she snatched it out of my hands. The cashier shoved the bag in my hand and immediately turned back to continue talking with her coworker while I was checking out. This wasn’t the first time I have had horrible customer service here and it is very disappointing.

name: Amy Le
text: Have shopped here since 2001. Last year I order almost $400 worth of clothes. Wanted to add it as little extra mini side gifts for my sisters. Never received it. Called them, and they gave me go in circles calling FedEx and what not. 6 months later still didn't get a final result. Never got my refund, emailed them, never received a reply, called them again, was told the same thing, 5-10 business days for the refund to go through. Still nothing. And it's almost Christmas and everytime it gets close to November, I'm just so upset about it. I didn't call my bank bc I thought they were going to fix the issue. Just so disappointed. Haven't shopped there since. I normally order my stuff online because I don't like going into the stores, very messy and unorganized. And after this incident, just really don't want to work with people like that.
