text: Great atmosphere with a good selection on outdoor items. Typical for most Bass Pro Shops.

name: Tiffany Bodie
text: Every year I bring my family to bass pro shop to take pictures with santa do some Christmas shopping. I love bass pro shop all together but today we had a horrible experience. We had to digitally sign up to take pictures with santa and we got there at 11:30 the wait was 2.5 hrs so after shopping going out to eat we came back at 2 exactly 2.5 hrs to find out there was another 50 minutes to wait okay no big deal we do more shopping with three kids finally we get the message at 3:30 that its time to take pictures with Santa to only find out their system is down and it'll be another two hours of waiting and all the people who weren't able to sign up to take pictures will be completely turned away as the bass pro shop employee stated. My kids were crushed when we told them we had to leave because I had to go to work in an hour and they spent all day being patient waiting to see santa. I'm one family out of a whole store full that went through this I hope they come up with a better system by next year but honestly I dont think we will be coming back to see santa it's much easier and less of a hassle to just go to the mall.

To the staffs credit they where very nice and tried their best to find it and the computer said it was in stock for them too

There are a few department stores in the same shopping center, but not much else.

text: We visited Bass Pro shop on 8.1.18, which was our anniversary. I am only giving a 2 star rating because the man at the entrance was polite and Deandra at the Outdoor Traveler booth was excellent. We received no customer service anywhere else in the store. We went up stairs to the guns because I was interested in buying one. There were 2 associates there speaking to one customer at the counter. As we proceeded to the counter to look at the selection we were never acknowledged by them. Not even a simple greeting, even though we browsed near the counter and the camping section for several minutes. We then decided to go down stairs. We passed 2 more associates and was never acknowledged. We went to the general store. There was only one associate there and she had a line (This was the only place in the whole store that had a line of customers). We browsed  there hoping the line would soon shorten but no additional help came so we left... Just poor customer service for a business that was not that busy. Very disappointed.

text: My 11 year old grandson needed a new pair of camo water boots. Got a great brand at a great price. He wears them all the time. He would wear them to school if they would let him. My grandson always enjoys walking around and looking at everything that is displayed at Bass Pro Shop. It is one of his favorite places to go.

name: Riley Wallace

name: Stephen Hoist
text: I have been going to the Spanish Fort location for several years.  It had been a while since I was last in there.  I have never had an issue before but this time I was there to spend some money.  I went up to look at a  rifle scope that I had been looking at online.  I went upstairs and took the long way to get there.  We were greeted properly walking in so didn't see any reason to think anything else.  We walked through the bows, then walked past the rifle racks to the scopes.  The guys working the counter were working with other customers so I looked around, I found the one I wanted to see.  In that process, I found another that I was interested in I looked up to see the status of the salespeople and they were over on the other side talking to each other and what looked to be looking at a phone behind the counter.  I left the counter went to check on kids who were by the aquarium.  We walked around and I decided I was going to get both of the scopes I found.  I went back and both salespeople were talking to one person.  So while I was waiting, I found a third scope I wanted.  The lady they were talking to left and they went back to the other end of the counter and did what they were doing before.  Now I don't like when a salesperson hovers over me, but I have worked in retail enough to at least let a customer know I am there to help.  I couldn't even get that out of them, so we walked away.  They missed a out a $4K sale.  I am not going to beg for them to help me.  They weren't busy.  The way I see it is they were just busy ignoring me.  Walking to the exit, I found a gear bag for a decent price and decided to buy it.  The man at the cash register was awesome.  If the guys at the gun counter were, Bass Pro would have sold me a lot more than a $12.99 bag.  I will go back again.  Like I said, this was the first time I had a bad experience there.

name: STEPHEN KEARNEY
text: You have to visit this store...they have everything.  Very knowledgeable staff

name: Jimmy Wayne
text: Brought in a 13 Concept A3 baitcaster which is a 200 dollar and up reel. I have taken many of reels to this location and have never had an issue at all with any of them untillll today. I was explaining to the associate that this reel has a special coating and I would get it spooked somewhere else if he thought their machine would scratch it and this special coating is to guard it against saltwater. I confidently walked around and did some more shopping picked up my reel and checked out and went on about my work day. On my way home I peeked In the box to find the top of my new expensive reel scratched up and the coating removed. I have no confidence in this store was told that they would handle the situation and call me back later and low and behold here we are with a scratched up reel I do not want to fish with due to it might corroding and the warranty is void. I’ll update if they make it right but lost all confidence in their pro service.

text: Nice store but I only shop here when I have gift cards to spend as they are more expensive than anyone else or if I'm researching something I want online and know they carry it I'll go look at it in person there before I order offline for cheaper. I've ate at the restaurant a few times had good and bad experiences there, kids love the fish tank of course and they always have a really good santa and bunny. I'm going here today with my 4 year old because i have a bunch of gift cards saved up and can get him some cool toys. I'm sure they have some specialty stuff that's hard to come by at other places and the staff always seems helpful unless it's a mad house day in which case I just wait my turn someone will help you when they can.

name: Becky Hall
text: Not enough employees. We were upstairs getting a cooker and sweet girl working there had three people waiting on help. She was good. She just needed help.

name: Tony Lent
text: They have closed their resturant for good. This was a key point for making the 1.5 hour trip to Bass Pro since the prices on merchandise are so high.

name: Chief Runamuk
text: Fishing gear food clothes what could be better

name: amy dewberry
text: Don't waste your money eating here.  For starters, our wait time was 30 minutes and the place was dead.  Maybe 5 families eating, no one at the bar.  Empty seats everywhere, we order our food, it was cold.  My burger bun was so soggy. The meat had a weird taste. My husbands shrimp pasta was bland. The only thing that was half way decent was the bread they brought out.  We learned an expensive lesson.

name: JoHanna Ellerbe
text: The fried pickles are the best! The shrimp was amazing. Our waitress was amazing and was very polite when we ended up changing tables to accommodate more guest at last second. The wait to see santa at Christmas is brutal, but there was plenty of things to keep the kids ocuppied. We will go back!

We then kept looking around. Stopped at the aquarium and sat at the benches around it for a little bit. Went to look at camping items and my husband and son went to look at weapons so my daughter and I sat at the bench on an overlook to rest and look at all the diaramas around the store. We spent our gift certificates and had a blast. Will be back to visit.

name: Jenn Daughenbaugh
text: My husband went to the Bass Pro Shop in Daphne, Al. today, looking to purchase a small boat or kayak for fishing. He went into the tracker boat section, spoke with two elderly gentlemen, he doesnt rememeber his name but the gentleman that let him back in the building after looking at the boats outside didnt say anything to him, just opened the door and walked away. So he approached another gentleman sitting at the desk, asked about one of the boats they had outside and about financing, the gentleman’s response was if you dont have a 700 or better they wont finance you and they wont finance anything under $5000.00. Assuming because of how my husband looked that his score was under a 700. So my husband went inside and started looking at kayaks, he was up there for close to an hour and was not approached one time by a sales associate to see if he needed help, at that point he left the store. So not only did you lose a possible sale on a boat you also lost out on the sale of a kayak. Your salesman in the tracker boat section are extremely rude and all your employees need some educating on customer service and he will never shop in another Bass Pro Shop again.

text: I went around 2:30 or 3 to pick up a santa pass and told the lady I got the pass from I would be coming back after I got myself and my dogs ready. I had a 6:00 pass, so around 5 I loaded up myself, my fiancé and our 4 dogs, just too be told at the door that santa wouldn’t take pictures with animals... if I was told that when I picked up the pass, it would’ve been fine. But to be told once we got there really upset me. I’m not sure if it’s just this bass pro that doesn’t allow pics with animals or what but for the last 3 years I’ve taken pics with santa and my dogs. So we will be traveling to prattville for our picture with santa from now on.

text: Vista the store 7/8/2017 I was looking for kitchen towels with a bear theam and knew this was the place to find them. Find them I did on the bottom shelf in the fudge room. The stack was coverd with mouse droppings, mouse hair and left nut casings. REALLY 3 employees in there not helping customers clearly they should be checking their goods. Gross. Continued to shop ready to check out and only 2 lanes open on a Saturday with a packed store. The place was full of employees but none seemed to be doing much more than standing around. After 15 min in line and not moving much at all we left our full cart and walked away.  On the way out the employee at the exit asked how we enjoyed our BP experience I let her know about the mouse mess and wait to checkout her response was "owell that's BP guess you won't be back" drove an hour and half and won't do that again.

name: Beth Eason
text: I love Maurice's and the quality of clothing the company puts out. I have been to this particular location quite a few times but the last time I walked in was so bad, I vowed not to go again. I'm already an anxiety riddle person but the sales rep. was constantly following me around the shop. I felt like I was being targeted. I have a lot of tattoo's so I forgave the girls ignorance but way to make a customer feel unwelcome and awkward. I literally put all the clothes I had in my hands down and walked out. I love the company, the clothes, and the atmosphere but I can't walk back in this store without feeling like I am being hunted. I'd rather go online and not have to deal with such an uncomfortable feeling.

name: Jacqueline Walton
text: I rated one star simply because i spent $70. The manager was very rude and inconsiderate when talking to customers and other employees. One employee was at the front near the entrance and the manager was all the way at the register yelling and having a out loud conversation about scheduling and her interview at another job while us 10 customers were shopping. The manager then started walking around the store spraying some kind of spray in the air (too much spray) as if we wasn't there. Do that after you clear the store before letting the next only 10 at a time customers in. My daughter was holding some jewelry we wanted to buy.. The manager said "Mam you're supposed to leave all jewelry at the front of the store, I'll take it" she gave it to her then while walking towards the register, she hollered across the store loud at another employee "Are you watching the jewelry? I know you're not because jewelry is on the floor" meaning a customer was holding jewelry prior to purchasing. I WILL NEVER SHOP AT THIS STORE EVER AGAIN!!

name: Jennifer Pouncy
text: Love, love, love this store! The wide selection of clothes and shoes are fantastic! Whatever your style they are sure to have it. Great deals on some of the cutest outfits I've seen this year! I found 2 dresses on the $3.99 rack that I bought after I took them both to the counter for a price check because I was sure they had been misplaced. I really thought that they cost more than the ticket said because of how cute and stylish both the dresses were. Definitely my favorite clothing store! I'll be sure to come back asap.

text: My place to go to relieve stress!  I took my mom  who is a fan of Chico's and boy did she go crazy!  Sales person is very attentive and seeing my mother with armful of clothes, she immediately prepared her with a dressing room.  I love this store and cant wait to go back again.

name: Phil James
text: Very disappointed in the customer service. Prices were good but the sales clerks never spoke to us. I watched while my wife was looking at clothing.  She was wearing shorts and a tee-shirt because it's easier to try on clothes. She was completely ignored. The salespeople greeted and engaged in conversation every lady who was dressed up or seemed to be known to them to help them find things. My wife was looking for a particular item and they were no help. Even after my wife approached one of the sales clerks she didn't offer to help. They even ignored an elderly lady in a wheelchair. As an old retail manager, I found that level of elitism appalling. So the moral of the story is, if you don't care if salespeople are rude, this is the place for you. But if you need help finding something or you want to be treated courteously, then stay away from this place.

name: Taylor Mallicoat
text: I took multiple large bag of clothes in there for her to look at, and as soon as she saw a Fringe Consignment Shop receipt that was left in a bag she stopped looking completely and said she couldn't take any of it. She didn't even look through 95% of my items. If she can't be bothered to look through the stuff I brought there, I can't be bothered to shop there anymore.

resp.text:
As a former employee of Fringe, I have experience with their policies and hold the same standards for items that I accept.  Basically, I accept current styles, in good condition, that I have an immediate need for in my inventory.  I do not accept casual items (sweatshirts and t-shirts) or items that show excessive wear. When my quality standards are met, any rejection is based on the needs of our store and should not be taken personally.

Taylor, I remember this specific visit and urge you to try again, possibly before taking your items elsewhere.

text: They messed up my hair I wanted blonde and I got brown gray purple color it was awful I had to pay someone else to fix it I will never be back and never recommend they won't even try and make it right I'm out $260 for one hair do

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your experience wasn’t to your standards. The paper work that you signed at the beginning of your service, explains that if you are unsatisfied with your hair, your stylist will be more than happy to come up with an arrangement to get your hair where you would like it to be. We truly wish you would have come to us first so we could evaluate your hair and make it right for you without the additional costs of another salon. We have offered for you to come in and have us take a look at your hair to evaluate the situation, and we are sorry that you did not want to come in to work this out. Unfortunately, due to the time your stylist spent with you, product used, and not having the opportunity to evaluate your hair in person, we are unable to refund you for this service. Upon reviewing your paper work, your stylist noted that your hair would need more than one service to achieve the end results that you were wanting. This is due to the fact that your hair was already previously lightened at home before your visit to us. We are always striving for what's best for our clients. In this circumstance, your hair wouldn't be able to handle any further lightening in one visit. It is our understanding that in order to protect the integrity of your hair, you and your stylist decided to go with a darker blonde until your next service. We aren't quite sure what happened between the time you left the salon and now, but after your service you told us that you loved your hair and even booked your future reservation with us. We deeply value you as a customer of ours and we are sorry to see you go. We appreciate your review and we hope you have a wonderful day.

Enough about that.. on to the good stuff... Isaac was the salesman tonight at Bridge Streets Lucky Brand store. I had a shirt in mind to buy after seeing it on a friend. Isaac knows clothing and he knows it well.. after talking and shopping I was ready to pay for my shirts and as I walked by the jeans he said, I think you’d look great in certain Jean (can’t remember the number/style jean) ... one step further gave me the reason why!! Thanks Lucky Brand Isaac!!!

I needed different sized but not once did someone come check on me and offer though I was in there for 30 min. When I left the fitting room with my arms full again, no one asked how it went, nothing, and there was one other person in the store.  I asked about a military discount as I saw an advertisement for a student/teacher discount. I was told no. I just spent $400 and am tempted to go return it all because I’m so disgusted with the service I received. The manager needs to do some firing and rehiring, and I only hope the manager wasn’t there while I was shopping.

name: sheila stinson
text: Have no idea about this place

name: Krystal Rogers
text: Great staff

name: Valarie Satterwhite-hill
text: Great customer service!

name: Greg Hicks
text: Very nice people. Clean, and obviously very busy. Several of my riding friends have recommended this place for doing quality work.

name: David Bartlett
text:
I just relocated to Alabama from Texas when I contacted, Ronnie.  I had been having problems with finding someone to work on my bike.  I have a ’95 Honda VT1100c Shadow.  No one wanted to work on it because of it’s age & my regular mechanic had closed up shop.  When I spoke to, Ronnie I explained what I wanted him to do.  I asked him how long would it take to complete the job.  He told him that it would be two weeks.  I agreed to that.  He came out to my house in late July to pick up my bike & take it to his shop.
I waited the two weeks & gave him al call.  He said that he was still working on another bike & he was waiting for parts to come in.  I said, that was fine, I can wait for a few more weeks.  Two more weeks came about & he still hasn’t gotten to it.  So, I just gave up & bought another bike in September.  I finally got a call from him on October 10th & 12:38 pm.  He said that he got it done.  I called him back & asked him how much it was, he said the total was $865.44.   I told him I would have to pick it up in a month. He agreed.  When I got there on November the 23rd to pick it up, he had flattened the rear tire.  He said  he broke the valve stem.  He told me he was going to charge me $75.00 to replace the stem that he broke.  I then asked him if we could start it, he said again, no.  The bike did have to be bottle fed.  So, I took it home.  When I got home I bottle fed it, it wouldn’t start.  I called him & he said that it ran when he had it.  So, I asked him if he could look at it & see if he could figure out what was wrong.  He said that it would be two weeks & he would get $80.00 an hour to fix it.  Keep in mind, I just gave him the previous day, $865.00 in cash.  So, I took the carbs back off.  The only thing he changed was the diaphragms. The main jets, slow jets all were corroded & stopped up. He had the float heights all off.  He even used rubber hose for fuel line.  I called him back to ask for half a refund on it. I called him out on what he did.  When I told him that the jets were filthy & the carb bodies were filthy he stuttered & then told me that I am not getting sh*t back and hung up.  I wouldn’t let this man work on anything.  The review on here before mine had a bad experience & they were there when I picked up my bike.  If I could give it negative starts if I could. These pictures below show what I got for my money. You can see that the bottom of the carbs are green & the jets are old & stopped up.

name: Keaton Christie
text: Love going here! Lots of motorcycle parts... accessories... Clothing and leather...great place!

name: Mark Shelton
text: Extremly Unprofessional Suggest Anyone Needing Work Finds it Elsewhere

name: lectricdave
text: 140.00 to install 2 tires,,, won't happen again

name: Ryan Iversen
text: Support your local small business owner

name: Icysnoow S
text: Awesome people

name: Vickie Thrower-Mills
text:
We took our 2001 Indian Chief that had been setting up for 7 years to this shop.  Big Mistake.  He charged us $3500 plus to fix it.  He was clearly aware that it had set up.  The first time we went to get it, It would not start and the lights wouldn't work.  He ask how long has this gas been in here. My husband said 7 years remember you were supposed to drain the tank for me.  He even wrote it sat up for 7 years on the receipt.  He painted the front  fender with paint that didn't match.  He put a used rear tire on it and called it a new one.  It had dirt and clay mud on it and the bike wouldn't start so where would the mud come from on a new tire? .  We left it with him for obvious reasons.  My husband ask him to replace the bushing in the handle bars since we were leaving it anyway.We paid him in the beginning to change the light covers.  He charged us twice the original one he ordered we found in the saddle bags.    My husband starts home on it today.  The brake light would not go off and the mirror was just spinning. You would think he would have saw that when replacing the bushing in the handlebars. My husband gets to Arab while driving the brand new war bonnet on the fender fell off.  Oil is leaking from a bike that he supposedly changed the oil and fixed the clutch on it.  We paid this man 3700 plus and he didn't take enough pride in his work to even wipe the dust off the bike.  I was using his shop rag to do that while we were waiting to get it running last week.  He literally took it out of my hand.  When I first met him i told my husband he seems like a good Christian person.  Boy was I wrong he might be a Christian.  I have no Idea but good is far from the truth.  We are very upset with the way we were ripped off.
We took our bike to another shop because it was obvious that Ronnie did not change the tires, the battery, fix the carburetor or anything we ask him and paid him to do. They could not believe that anyone would say the changed tires when they were literally rotten around the rim because it had set up for 7 years. He really screwed us out of 3700.00 He is a dishonest man. The Battery was 7 years old yet he said it was new. Along with the tires.

name: The Hillbilly
text: Always a awesome time great people great service

name: brandon brooks
text: Good times qnd good craftsmanship.

name: sarah Saunders
text: Wonderful place to get all your needs.

name: Wayne Gardner
text: Nice place for motorcycle parts,or used motorcycles to buy

name: Roberto Hernandez
text: Amazing

name: Chris Winchester
text: Friendly service

name: Jeff Cornett
text: Very friendly place 2 visit

name: Michael Martin
text: Great place

name: Monte Hall
text: Great customer service

name: Farrell Rench
text: Nice

name: Laura Ballard
text: I can't stop shopping at Mint Julep! I continue to purchase from The Mint Julep Boutique because their selection is always amazing, their prices are reasonable and their quality is excellent. They also have superb packaging and their online orders are shipped super fast! I've never had to deal with customer service as I've never had any issues with my orders, but I can only imagine that it would be nothing but top notch if I had to!

name: Jennifer Rosenthal
text: I have been ordering from The Mint Julep Boutique for several years now and have always had the best experience! Customer service is impeccable, the selection is always amazing, shipping is immediate and I always know that I will receive top quality. Just this week I ordered an adorable poncho for a last minute fall photo shoot and was so nervous it would not arrive on time. I ordered it on Sunday and it arrived at my door on Wednesday! I didn’t even pay for expedited shipping! Honestly my favorite boutique!!

name: Jennifer Benson
text:
So much to offer!
Love browsing the website. So many choices and categories and love that I can save my "favorites" and come back to them later.

name: Renee Berens
text:
As always great

Order was Quickly delivered and loved all my items as usual! Been shopping thru mint julep for years a now! Great service! Package was well sealed and kept.

name: Heather Statler
text: There is no way to put into words how fabulous The Mint is! I have tried several other boutiques and nothing compares to them! Not only are their clothes fabulous, great quality and affordable (especially the sales !) but their customer service is above and beyond! They are super quick and efficient with online ordering, processing and shipping. Literally within hours my items ship. They are always correct too, never get a wrong item or size. Everything I buy for myself or gifts, always gets high compliments and no one else ever has it! SO being unique and different is a plus! I love that online they give the measurements for each item as well as model info to compare (that takes forever to do and post I am sure) as we all know some items you need a small, some a medium, etc. That is the best touch and feature I say so you know you are getting the right size the first time. None of that generic general size charts that other websites do! You can also buy seasonal items year round, so you are always ahead of the game! I have shopped with them even before the pandemic and you would have no idea that a world crisis is going on with the way they continue to deliver literally and figuratively Thank you guys again for everything!

name: Kimberly Edmondson
text: I purchased 2 Make Your Life Easy tops. One shirt the color was off. Had to exchange, no return. The color I wanted wasn't available. Had to wait to restock. Both shirts pilled after one wash. I found the same top on Amazon and Walmart for $2 less. You get free returns and  exchanges with Amazon and Walmart so save your time and money.

resp.text: Hey Kimberly, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met. Please feel free to contact our customer service team at help@shopthemint.com so we can work towards a resolution as we would love the opportunity to assist you. Kindly note that we offer both returns and exchanges. :)

name: Elizabeth Scott
text: I feel like your selection has gotten worse online now that you’ve opened boutiques in AL.  I haven’t found anything cute in a while except price gouged inventory you got from wholesale markets. Shame. I watched this company grow from the bottom up and it seems now it’s only for the locals.

resp.text: Hey Elizabeth, The Mint Julep Boutique is an online boutique with only one storefront in Auburn, AL. Our single storefront has been open for over 5 years. Perhaps we are being mixed up with a different boutique?

name: Laurie Leazer
text: I want to thank customer service!   For some reason my items were going into my bag at a higher price then on the sight!   Evidently, they were sending me emails to make me aware and I did not receive them!   Due to all the confusion, they were very professional and offered me a gift card  to use on my next purchase!  They not only were quick to respond but very professional!  I will be shopping at this Boutique more and recommending them to my friends and family! 😊 Thank You!

name: Verona Williams
text: Sorriest business ever.Never anything I like in my size and they dont value their customers.Never again will any of my money go to support this business any  shape,fashion,or form. I didnt feel like a valued customer at all and smalls in blouses look like larges and big traah bags on.Swallows a small torso.

resp.text:
Hey Verona, thank you so much for your feedback! We are so sorry to hear that our clothing sizes don’t work for you and that we are out-of-stock in some of the items that caught your interest. We completely understand your disappointment and we are incredibly sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you. Due to limited quantities and high demand it’s a standard process for us to restock items quickly. As mentioned, if you’d like to signup for our VIP restock notifications we will let you know as soon as we get the items back instock. :)

Again, we are truly sorry that the items you were interested in purchasing are temporarily out-of-stock.

Providing an excellent shopping experience along with exceptional customer service, is of utmost importance. We value each and every customer! Thank you for taking time to share your feedback. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future!

name: Ashley Andrews
text: Cute little boutique in the mall with great selection on trendy clothes and gifts. Really cute hats as well. Staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Lydia H
text: I seriously love The Mint Julep Boutique! They have the trendiest styles and the best customer service!! Can't thank you enough for being my go-to online boutique! :)

name: Julia
text: I can't say enough about this wonderful store!  I order online weekly and love the clothes!  The fast shipping is a PLUS!  Thank you for making me look GREAT!!!!

name: Haley
text: Ladies, save your money and go elsewhere. Their clothes are so cheaply made. You can find the majority of their stuff on Amazon for half the price. But if you’re willing to pay $30 for a $10 shirt, this is your place!

resp.text: Hey Haley, thank you for your feedback. We are so sorry to hear that your expectations were not met. Please feel free to contact our Customer Service team at help@shopthemint.com or by starting a Live Chat session on our website, so that we can work towards a resolution. We would love the opportunity to assist you further! :)

name: Jenae Strickland
text: I have only ordered online from this store and I love it. The customer service is absolutely outstanding! The mail had delayed my exchange and I really needed the new sized dress for a wedding. After contacting them, they immediately got my exchange through and sent out the new dress to a new address! I am so appreciative of their time and helpfulness. I will definitely be ordering again in the future!

name: Holly Wade
text: I could shop here exclusively! Love the selection! Everything I've ever ordered has fit perfectly and been shipped so quickly!! Got to love the witty names for all of the merchandise also!! You guys are awesome! 🥰❤️

name: Alex Hess
text:
Happy Customer!
I love Mint Julep! Prices and quality are great. My items always arrive quickly and in good condition. I have ordered many times from Mint Julep over the past few years and have always been happy with their products!

name: April Nailer
text: Super cute stuff!  Friendly staff!

name: Julia Lambert
text:
I've ordered from this site multiple times now. The apparel is reasonably priced, well-made and just so perfect.

Their clothing sells out fast, which means sometimes when you place an order for an item that is labeled as having limited availability, it has been oversold. Having been in this situation recently, I have to say that the best part about the Mint Julep Boutique is the exemplary customer service its ladies strive for. I really can't say enough about that last component. It's so important – and great motivation to keep returning!

name: Lauren Bressler
text: Unless you are 100% sure that the item you ordered is going to fit and that you’re going to love it, don’t order from here. I spent a while on their website picking out a dress for a wedding, but never once was presented with the return policy. The dress I ordered was way to big and when I went to return it, I found that you have to pay to ship the item back ($8 for the slowest option) and only get store credit. With so many great clothing companies offering free returns, or at least your original form of payment back, it’s really not worth ordering from here.

resp.text: Hey Lauren, thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that the dress didn't fit as expected. If you ever have questions regarding the sizing of an item, please feel free to contact our Customer Service team at help@shopthemint.com or you can always start a Live Chat on our website. We look forward to hearing from you so we can work towards a resolution on this order and future shopping experiences.

name: Rebecca Navarre
text: I am happy I discovered this gem! I live in Michigan so sadly I haven’t visited the store but I shopped online and was very pleased with my transaction. The clothes came very quickly and they were adorable — just as pictured. Highly recommend!

name: Penny Cobb
text:
Stylish pieces, good quality, good prices!
I love my Mint outfits and receive compliments every time I wear them. The fast, friendly service and great customer care will keep me coming back!

name: chelsea malone
text:
Shipping is fast however you should read the return policy. No refund to your original payment method. Only store credit. You have to pay to ship the item back.

Bought two items went off the sizing guide and it didn't fit. Ordered another item and the zipper broke before I could even fully put it on. Material not so great and the customer experience I received wasn't great. I mean two items I returned and can't get the original payment... returning well before the 30 day policy. I will not be ordering again and do NOT recommend.

name: Anna Carter
text: AMAZING EXPERIENCE in this store! So welcoming and was greeted right when i walk in the door and asked if i needed any help. Two girls helping me tonight (4/15/19) helped me find what I was looking for for my older daughter who was not with me to try on and even pulled two items from their warehouse that were not in the store and told me they would already have them tomorrow morning! Awesome service and such a sweet staff today! THANK YOU Mint Julep Girls!!

resp.text: Hey there! We absolutely love hearing such positive feedback from our customers. We are so glad that you received amazing service while shopping with us! We always strive to provide a warm and inviting atmosphere and to make the customer feel valued and respected while helping them with the shopping process. We hope that your purchase exceeds your expectations and we hope to be able to continue to surpass your expectations in the future!

name: Andrea Bauer
text: I absolutely enjoy this boutique! I order very often, probably once a month. I hardly every have any problems and when I have in the past they were fixed within hours. Keep up the awesome work!! I am spreading your name! Now, back to shopping :)

name: Jazmyn & Josh
text: Been an avid, loyal customer of the past few years and have been incredibly pleased with the service, quality and consistency of reliability to deliver the next best outfit of comfort, feeling my best and (bonus) compliments.

name: Kadelia Ware
text: I started working for the company last year in December it was some I would do but it was some I wouldn't want to do because you don't really make much money for real.but I enjoyed my time there it was easy 😉💚💚👈

name: Mikayla Hiatt
text: First I have to brag on the customer service. I ordered a pair of shoes back in April, wore them twice and the strap ripped. I contacted customer service and told them what happened and they sent me out a replacement pair that same day and I received them 2 days later! I really appreciated how understanding and nice they were about it. Their clothes are so cute and they don’t fit small like other boutiques. They fit true to size and even have bigger sizes which is great.

resp.text: Hey there! We absolutely hate to hear of a customer receiving a defective or damaged product, but we are so glad we were able to make up for that with fast and friendly customer service! We do our absolute best to cater to all of our customers in every aspect and are so glad that you feel we have been successful in doing so! We hope to continue doing business with you!

name: Meryl Daley
text: Adorable and high-quality clothes at a good price, fast shipping and exceptional customer service!!!!!! I love everything I order and if I ever need to exchange, they are so helpful and friendly!

name: Katherine Haywood
text: I absolutely love this place! They have super cute and unique items.

name: Malory Bostwick
text: AMAZING! Best customer service ever!

name: Rachel Furtick
text: I’m in South Carolina, so I can only shop online, but I feel like I shop in person with how nice the online staff is!! They are so helpful and so sweet! Everything is of high quality and so stinking cute!!

name: Kay Bostwick
text: Cute clothes and great service.

name: Jane Doe
text: If I could give The Mint negative stars I would. If you value respect, honesty, and your sanity DO NOT WORK HERE. The company is corrupt from the inside out and is very poorly managed. The Mint only cares about the success of the company instead of the happiness of their employees. Within 6 months their entire customer service department has been fired, or has quit due to unfair treatment. If you want a yearly bonus, or a pay raise you won’t see it here. If you want an open team that is willing to listen to your ideas, you won’t find it here. The Mint is extremely cliquey and gossip is found everywhere. When asking for a promotion, or a raise they claim they have no record of your job performance even though you have worked 40+ hours a week. There is no organization. Once the manager has her mind made up good luck trying to speak with her and have your opinion/ideas heard. The clothes are cheap and not worth the money The Mint is marketing them for. The return policy is TERRIBLE. You won’t get your money back. Want better prices for the SAME items, go to Amazon. The Mint of full to lies and deception. Run while you still have the chance and don’t get sucked into this ticking time bomb. You’ll regret it.

name: Sandra P
text:
Awesome boutique!
There is a reason I keep purchasing from this boutique. I love all of their stuff!

name: Ashley Lott
text: They are always super quick with shipping and when I called to say my zipper broke the first time I put a jumpsuit on, they sent me a new one within a week. They saved the day!

name: alexis karnell
text: So I order the just relax pant (they fit true to size and super comfy and of course so cute) but that’s not what this review is about, it’s about their AMAZING customer service. I order the pant about three weeks and first time ever ordering something from them. So my order was  supposed to arrive April 3 but was never delivered went back and forth with the post office and they could not find the package, eventually I just called they store told them everything that happen and they offered a store credit or to just resend what I ordered. So I had them resend the pant and when they did and finally received my original package ordered at the same time they resent the new package. So I called the store and told them everything that I received both packages and the women Allie is amazing and sent a return slip because i don’t need two of the same pant especially when I only paid for one. They have top notch coustomer service with helping with packages not being delivered and having to return, even sending a genuine email about me being honest of what happened. I will definitely be ordering more from this boutique !! They truly deserve more than a 5 star rating !

resp.text: Hey there! Customers like you are the ones that make our jobs so much more fun. We are so sorry that there was a delay in receiving your order but are ecstatic that you did end up getting them and loving them! Here at The Mint the customer is always our main priority and making sure their expectations are met is always the main objective. Thank you for providing such positive feedback, and we hope we continue to exceed your expectations with your future purchases!

name: Elodi Breg
text: I absolutely love Mint Julep! They have great sales compared to the boutiques near my house. I have been buying clothes online from mint julep for the past 3 years and everything I have ever gotten has been a great purchase. Whenever I have occasions I always choose to go to shop the mint julep boutique. Sadly I live several hours away from mint julep but was lucky enough to visit the boutique once and it was also a great experience. The monogramming is also great! I've already purchased  a pair of monogram sandals! I live in those shoes!

name: Jaime Barta
text: I love The Mint Julep Boutique!! I ordered my wedding dress from there a few weeks ago, and LOVE it!! The fit and quality is perfect! I also ordered a pair of sandals from them yesterday, last minute for my Saturday wedding, and they have already shipped! I was worried about not having them in time, so I paid for 2-day shipping, but probably didn't even need to worry, as my dress was bought on a Friday, shipped same day, and was received on the following Tuesday. I will absolutely continue to be a customer of Mint Julep from now on!!

resp.text: Hi Jaime! We are so glad you LOVE your wedding dress and hope you love your sandals! We hope you have a wonderful wedding on Saturday! Please do not hesitate to reach out to us at help@shopthemint.com or give us a call Monday - Friday 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM CST if you ever need assistance with anything. Thank you so much for your valuable feedback! :)

name: Emmalyn Bradford
text: I love love love the mint!! I have been shopping online with them for years and I’ve never been disappointed. Unlike other boutiques who have cheaply made clothing, the quality of the Mints clothing is unbeatable. The price is perfect for the cute styles and quality you’re getting. Shipping is always fast and reliable!

name: Ashley Atem
text: The store is so pretty, they have a large variety of clothes to chose from. The associates are super friendly and interact with their customers. I love how every time you walk in the door you are kindly greeted by an employee. Very chic store. I love the store.

name: Sami Nicholls
text: Very fast shipping, I got my package within 3 days. Returns were quick, I didn't like how you get a gift card as a refund,  but it was issued very fast. Quality of clothes is nice.

resp.text: Hi Sami! Thank you for your valuable feedback! Please reach out to us at help@shopthemint.com if you ever need assistance with anything! We will be happy to help! :)

name: Ashley Martin
text: Clothing is nice but sizing chart is off and inconsistent. The return process is too long and the staff are in no hurry to get the return processed for store credit. Had to call and email several times to check on about order and received inconsistent anwswers. Staff member came across as sassy and rude via email chain and and assumed I was lying about receiving inconsistent information. Will not be shopping here again as I feel staff do not appreciate paying customers and do not care to make customers happy.

resp.text: Hey there! We are so sorry that you weren’t pleased with your shopping experience with us. We do not aspire to be disrespectful, rude or dismissive in any way, and are sincerely sorry that you experienced this with our customer service. We at the Mint appreciate each and every customer and always want to provide the best service possible to them. We apologize if our returns process did not meet your expectations, and are working to speed up our process in order to better serve our customers! We are sincerely sorry for the inconvenience and if there is ever anything we can assist you with in the future we would be more than happy to make up for your previous experience!

name: Alex Bergeron
text: I love this boutique because of the professional service!! Y’all are the best people to work with!

name: Tanah Reaves
text: The Mint Julep Boutique is my first choice every time I need an outfit for ANY occasion - from work to weddings and everything in-between! Their customer service cannot be beat and they always ship my orders SO FAST! I've been a faithful customer for the past few years and they just keep getting better

name: Rozanne Robinson
text: Awesome. I order on-line from The Mint Julep but rarely get to shop at the store in Auburn Mall. Love all their clothes and jewelry!!

resp.text: Thank You Rozanne!

name: Katherine Pennell
text: I ordered a top online and it was so fast and easy! It shipped literally later that same day and arrived two days later! Such cute clothes and great service and not to mention, just by giving my email address, they sent me a $10 off coupon that I got to use on my very first purchase! Awesome deals. Will def order from here again.

name: Danika Jess
text: I ordered this dress for my graduation and when it came it was too small. No big deal, you run that risk when you order online. I called to see if I could get a refund for the dress since they didn't have it in the next size up, and after being on hold for about 20 minutes I was told that I needed to email their customer service. After explaining that I probably would not be ordering from their site again, and I wanted a refund instead of a store credit. They issued a code. About a week after I sent the dress back, I received an email today saying that my return had been processed and attached was my gift card code. So I went ahead and tried to call their customer service team to try to get the refund they told me I'd get. I waited on hold for another 15 minutes before I gave up and called their store in Auburn. I asked if the associate at the store could try to transfer me over to customer service, because I wasn't getting through. She tried three separate times, and eventually came on the line suggesting that CS had left early from the office. I called at 4:07 and they were supposed to be there until 4:30. Ultimately, the customer service team has been a nightmare to deal with, and since I had to pay for shipping both ways, I've lost money from ordering with them. Needless to say, I won't be shopping with them again. I ordered a new graduation dress from Red Dress Boutique and they were delightful to deal with.

resp.text: Hi Danika! We are so sorry for your experience and any confusion! We will definitely look into why your phone call did not reach us timely. That is not typical! We have reviewed your email history with our Customer Service Ladies and it looks like we were able to get you taken care of! We understand your frustration and apologize again for any inconvenience. We would love to make your next experience with us a great one! Please email us at help@shopthemint.com if you ever need assistance with anything!

name: Ashley Coogle
text: Not only are the clothing pieces beautiful and diverse, the customer service is amazing! Without getting into too many details, they went above and beyond to help me with something that was totally my fault! I cannot say enough about my appreciation for this company!

resp.text: Hi Ashley! Thank you so much for your feedback and kind words! We are so happy that we were able to help you! Please don't hesitate to reach out to us in the future if you need assistance with anything else! :)

name: Madison Brown
text: I've only ever ordered online but I absolutely have been IN LOVE with every piece I've ordered. It's great quality and fits amazing. I will definitely continue to shop from here and will suggest this to everyone who asks! Fingers crossed I can actually make it to the store someday!

resp.text: Hi Madison! We are so happy you LOVE your items! Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We look forward to seeing you in the store someday! :) Please reach out to us at help@shopthemint.com if you ever need assistance with anything!

name: Kristin Poole
text: I LOVE THE MINT! The clothes are so cute, the customer service is always excellent, and they have an outfit for every occasion!

name: Kelley Garland
text: I absolutely love the selection that The Mint has to offers its customers! I always find what I am looking for because the website is very user friendly. The clothes are unique and I always get compliments/questions about the pieces I buy from The Mint.

name: Mackenzie Dokkebakken
text:
I purchase lots of items throughout the year because they are cute and reasonably priced, however; this past fall I purchased a package where I get free shipping all year long and a free dress on my birthday.  Well my birthday has come and gone and I reached out to the store twice wondering how to get my free dress, and no response.  I am very disappointed in this customer service and am looking for a different store to shop at.

**Resolved... the team responded to my review within hours and has since corrected the issue.

resp.text: Hi Mackenzie! We are so sorry you have not received a response from us and for any inconvenience this has caused you! Our Customer Service Team normally responds within a couple of hours, so we will take a look as to why we did not receive your messages! We have already sent you an email this morning to resolve the issue. You can always reach out to us at help@shopthemint.com or give us a call at (334)246-3901 if you need assistance with anything. We will be happy to help! We definitely want you to have a great experience! Thank you for being a loyal Mint Julep Boutique customer!

name: Lynn M. Stock. MS, LLMHC
text:
This company will not allow you to return any items for a refund of your original payment. Some items they will not allow you to return at all and others will only get you store credit. So, if you end up not liking their clothing style, material, and most importantly the quality, you are stuck with the items or returning for other items that will most likely not meet your expectations either.

The items are very overpriced for the lack of quality you will be getting. Their customer service is horrible and they have removed their Facebook option for reviewing them. Go figure.

resp.text: Hey there! We are so incredibly sorry that you did not have a pleasurable experience shopping with us, and are not happy with our Return Policy! We do strive to provide the best service possible in all aspects of the company, so that is why we state our Return Policy in detail on our site so a customer can be clear before purchasing! As for Facebook Reviews, this is not something we have control over, but is something that Facebook has changed for all businesses. We as a company are still growing and making adjustments and we appreciate your feedback so that we can grow and become a better company as a whole. We are sincerely sorry for any inconvenience you have experienced but if there is ever anything we can assist you with in the future we would be more than happy to make up for your previous experience!

name: Elizabeth Knowles
text: I love shopping at the Mint Julep Boutique and I really enjoy the in store pickup. The Mint Julep always has an outfit for any occasion. I was able to find the perfect Vacation Dress and got so many compliments wearing it!! The customer service girls are always so helpful!

name: Carli Durham
text: I have made a special trip to Auburn twice from Lake Martin (Live in Birmingham) just to go to this store. Their clothes are super cute and great quality, however both times I have been dissapointed with the selection. Dont make a special trip unless you live near or around Auburn. Order online!

resp.text: Hey there! We are happy that you love our clothes! We do have a much larger selection online due to the fact that we have limited space in store. We do however receive new shipments in store twice a week of New Arrivals. If you see anything online that you are wanting to try on in store, you can always call the store or customer service ahead of time and we will make sure that the item is in store for you to try on while you are in town. We are sorry for any inconvenience, please let us know if you have any other concerns in the future.

name: Lana Blankenship
text: I love this boutique! They have such a great selection of clothing and at great prices. Shipping is always fast and customer service is always helpful! Definitely my favorite online boutique!

name: Haley Stanley
text: I love shopping at Mint Julep! I use the in-store pickup option often and have had great experiences whenever I've had questions for their customer service team. The storefront is super cute too :)

text: Great customer service, Super fast shipping, Great quality clothing!

text: Fantastic! I ordered a pair of shoes from the website and they came in right on time. I could not have been more thrilled with the quality of the product. I have received many compliments on them!

text: I wish I lived closer to visit the store but for now ill shop online. They have the cutest clothes and great quality. East returns and fast shipping :)

resp.text: Hi Sara! Thank you so much for your feedback! We appreciate it so much! Definitely stop by our storefront if you are ever in the Auburn area! :) Let us know if you ever need assistance when shopping on our online site, www.shopthemint.com!

text: Friendly and helpful staff.  Found wonderful dress for sweet girl bday.

resp.text: Hey there! We are so happy that you were able to find a dress that worked out for you! We love hearing positive feedback and we hope we to continue to provide a friendly shopping experience for you in the future!

name: Kelli Fitzpatrick
text: I have ordered from Mint Julep for years now and have never been let down. Their clothes are cute, stylish, comfortable, reasonably priced and their customer service is outstanding. I have had minor issues with orders in the past and you can almost always immediately get someone on the phone who will resolve the issue quickly. I recently placed an order and accidently had the order sent (and deliver might I add) to our old address. Not realizing I did that until calling Mint Julep I obviously had not received my order. Feeling silly all the while, Mint Julep without hesitation reshipped my order without recharging me even though it was my fault the order was misplaced (still trying to get those shirts from the new owner btw). Will always use Mint Julep as my go to boutique!! Love this place!!

name: Nikki Hullender
text: LOOOOOOVE this boutique! i only place online orders as im in North Carolina but, they always have new arrivals, so much variety, and the quality is fantastic. I don't think ill ever shop anywhere else with the fast shipping and easiness of this place. The customer service replies fast and they're always nice too!

name: J K
text: Just your typical southern brand, only advertises to preppy white women and little regard for anyone outside of that bubble, including plus size or of color. If you do not fit the picture of the models on their site, don’t even bother coming here.

resp.text: Hey there! Thank you for taking time to write to us and express your concerns, and we are so incredibly sorry if we ever made you feel that our clothing is targeted to a specific body shape or image, as that certainly isn’t our intention! At The Mint Julep, our greatest desire is to ensure our customers are satisfied at all levels and find the most suitable way to address their concerns. We strive to achieve the highest level of inclusivity and diversity possible. Our goal is to provide amazing clothes and apparel to everyone. We are constantly looking for better ways to achieve this goal and your feedback is greatly valued. We hope that you will continue to check back with us as we seek to address your concerns.

text: Great clothes, great prices and nice employees.

text: Huge selection of clothes.  Everything is so cute.  Wish they had better help in the dressing room.

resp.text: Hi Faith! We are so glad you love our clothing selection! We are always working on improving our customer service and we greatly appreciate your feedback! We hope you will shop with us again soon!

name: Katie Brungardt
text: I have nothing but good things to say about Mint Julep! USPS delivered my package I ordered to the complete wrong address & Mint Julep didn't even hesitate in offering to reorder my lost items & give me store credit for the item out of stock. GREAT customer service!!

text: I could not be more happy with their clothes, and the price is so reasonable for the quality you get. I've never returned an item that I've purchased, and I love that they monogram now! My favorite online store when I'm in the mood for a wardrobe change!

text: Love The Mint! They have a great selection of styles for different ages, and the girls in the store are always extremely helpful.

name: Suzanne Rode
text: If this review were just about the clothing, it would easily be 5 stars. The total lack of customer service, though, drops them down to two. I placed an order on Thanksgiving Day and, about an hour later, got an email that the entire site was 40% off. I immediately emailed to ask if the sale could be applied to my order. I got a reply the next morning saying, sorry, there is nothing we can do. As someone who worked in retail management for 15 years, if that is actually their policy it is a terrible one and has lost them this customer. To make matters worse, I first posted this on their Facebook page and it seems to have mysteriously disappeared. I find it ridiculous that they would censor my post just letting others know about their bad policy. I hope the powers that be rethink the way they treat their customers. There are plenty of other boutiques with the same items who value their clients.

So now I have to find something that I like to use up the credit. Ugh!

name: MJ
text: Decided to shop at the Citi Trends on University Dr. The reason I visited was to find some summer sandals. The selection was good. The young lady on staff stocking was friendly. The gentleman cashier was matter-of-fact, direct and impersonal.

name: SHERRY WEATHERS
text: I give 3 stars the clothes are great but cashiers are very unprofessional and not friendly at all always playing! I'm probably not going back because its always like this and I just don't like to shop where I'm uncomfortable

text: Decent selection of clothing in every size from newborn to big and tall. The staff isn't the most friendly but they aren't mean either its just another day at the job for them.

name: Chris Barnes
text: Citi Trends is ALWAYS cool the only reasons it's not a 5. Too many clearance items had no price tags so the worker grabbed something $19.99 that was new to ring up. That's lazy and unprofessional. Don't treat customers like that so I left with buying nothing. No Stephon Marbury shoes and colognes were completely a disaster.

name: Breanna Drake
text: My daughters went into this store today. They are 16 years old. The manager stopped them and accused them of stealing a $3.99 ring. She asked if they could search them and go figure they didn’t find anything!! Let me tell you something my kids do not have to steal nothing! Next time you go to search a minor you better have law enforcement or security there and you better pull video before you falsely accuse a minor. Do you know how embarrassing that is !! This manager got an ear full today and has not heard the last from this parent! I am calling my lawyer to find out what can be done about searching a minor without law enforcement around or contacting a parent!!

name: Samantha Drake
text: They really accused me of stealing when I was holding my friends jewelry while she was in the dressing room. They went through all my bags in front  of everyone and embarrassed me, and go figure they found nothing! Need I mention my friend literally showed her the jewelry I was holding for her and she still went through my bags. This was so wrong of them!!!

text: My niece loves this store, when I say love I mean love. If only you could see her closet. Aeropostale jeans, sweat suits, shirts. She loves this store.😍

text: Racists and dont help they are rude to there colored employess by the look of it. I am asian. Worst customers service ever will never come back. The deal was good 3 shirts for 30 but my husband only liked one so i just had to return. Alll but i was treated like a i did a crime.

name: Front Desk
text: I would give no stars but it is not allowed. I just received the worst customer service ever from a young caucasisn manager with black hair and bumps all in her face and glasses and a young Caucasian boy with rwd bumos all in his face. The boy was my cashier and he was giving cash cards out to white customers only. When U asked for one, he gave me the worst stare. I have never been treated so ugly! I will never shop in that store again.
